1.content:
"I can't believe I finally get to meet your family, Cassie! Part of me feels terrible about asking you to marry me before doing this but I just couldn't wait. I've never been more sure of anything in my life, now all that's left is getting the family's blessing and we can start talking about the wedding!" You exclaimed up to your fiancé, taking a moment to stare at her gorgeous profile as she kept her eyes forward looking over the steering wheel. She smiled in return before responding,

"I just hope they like you as much as I do. My sisters I'm not worried about but my mom can occasionally come off a bit cold towards outsiders especially boys. I mean, you're the first boyfriend I've ever even shown to her and we're already engaged!" You sensed a bit of worry in Cassie's voice and responded quickly,

"Woah there Cassie it's alright, I can charm the pants off of anyone, you know this! I mean I won over you didn't I?"

"Oh wow look who seems so sure of himself!" You got Cassie laughing and could hear the shift in her tone immediately as she continued, "alright alright you little stud I believe you. I'm sure they're all going to love you."

You responded, "You're damn right they will." in a fake arrogant tone before the two of you laughed at how macho you attempted to sound.

It turned out you two were near the end of your long drive as Cassie turned onto a rather long driveway headed towards a large yet humble looking house. You climbed out of your seat onto the dashboard nimbly to get a better look and you noticed the house really was lovely. It wasn't a mansion by any means but it wasn't small either, sporting multiple rooms, two floors, a swimming pool and half of a basketball court around the back. Impressed you shot a look of overemphasized surprise to Cassie and she rolled her eyes at you in response. Parking her car near another one she quickly opened her driver's side door and stepped out of the car. You climbed down quickly following her. Even the jump from the floor of the car to the ground was significant for someone of your height, but you had learned over the years to be able to handle small feats of athleticism like this or else you would need assistance for far too much from others. Landing on the ground Cassie shot a look behind her and down, flashing you a gorgeous smile before walking to the rear door and opening it to remove both of your bags.

You couldn't help but stare at your beautiful fiancé as she leaned into the car, her tanned legs extending far above your head before ending in a pair of jean shorts. From your perspective you could always see just the slightest bit of her ass sticking out the bottom, a sight that consistently drove you wild. Leaning back out and closing the door, Cassie tossed you your bag, covered in army print, and you caught it. Sadly at your size any clothing or accessories that were usable by you were more often than not made for large G.I. Joe toys, a fact that used to bother you but now you've grown accustomed to. Swinging it over your shoulder you trotted along side Cassie's long strides as the two of you headed towards the front door.

Standing on the door mat now you began to feel the slightest bit nervous. Cassie had never had an issue for even a second with your height, but all of the sudden you began to stress over the possibility that it might not go as smoothly with the rest of her family. Before you had a chance to ask Cassie she reached out her hand and rung the doorbell. Immediately you heard footsteps slamming across hardwood floor getting closer and closer to the door. You couldn't help but get increasingly nervous, something in the back of your mind telling you that something was about to go terribly wrong.

Just then the door swung open and you took half a second to appreciate the source of your fiancé's radiant beauty. Immediately after you shouted up, "It's a pleas..." your mouth was silenced as an enormous flip flop, nearly as big as your entire body cast a shadow over you for a split second before slamming down on you. The crushing weight of a woman quite a bit heavier than Cassie completely flattened your body, leaving only your head visible.

"Welcome home, Cassie! It's so good to see you! Now where is that man of yours!?" Pulling Cassie into a tight hug for nearly ten seconds, Kimberly Smalls thought she felt something peculiar under her foot but was far too caught up in the joy of seeing her daughter to care.

Cassie pulled away from the hug, smiling and unaware of the torment you were feeling at that exact moment before peering downwards. Her eyes shot open in fear yet she saw your predicament, and as badly as she wanted to yell at her mother to lift her foot she also didn't want her first interaction with you to be one of panic and alarm. So calming herself down a bit she looked back up and nonchalantly said, "Take a look beneath your left foot, mom." Cassie even added a smile to feign like nothing at all was wrong.

The overbearing weight was suddenly removed from your form and you saw the faces of two beauties looking down upon you. Cassie's face portrayed a mixture of apologetic and "we'll talk about this later" while her mother's face expressed only shock.

"Oh. My. Goodness." Kimberly said, completely stunned at what she was looking at.

--------

Nearly five minutes later the three of you were sitting in the living room. Cassie and Kimberly were sitting in chairs while you were standing on a coffee table in between them. Kimberly was giving you a slightly uneasy look, as if she was analyzing every aspect of your being. Cassie had helped you brush off the fair bit of dirt that transferred from the sole of her mom's flip flop onto your clothes, hair, and face, but you still didn't feel truly clean. You had actually put in a lot of effort to look as nice as possible to meet Cassie's family, and her mother had undone all of it with one step. It seemed your fears were coming true, but you were resolved to not let things continue to go this poorly.

"Sophie, Maddie, come say hi to your sister and her new fiancé, Jake!" Cassie's mom shouted up and you heard the familiar sound of footsteps coming down a hallway then downstairs towards you three. You then saw two more stunning girls round the corner heading straight towards you. One, who you assumed to be Sophie due to her blonde hair, was wearing an incredibly revealing swimsuit leaving nearly nothing to the imagination. The other, which must have been Maddie, had her hair up in a tight ponytail accompanied by a tight sports bra and compression shorts. While not as gorgeous as Cassie to you, all three of the other women in this house were certified stunners by any man's standards.

"Woooooooaaaaaahhhhh you're so little, dude! How in the world are you so short but so normal looking otherwise?" Before introducing herself or anything Sophie asked the question you've answered millions of times in the most blunt way possible. As you prepped your answer, Maddie spoke up,

"Ignore my rude stupid sister, I'm Maddie that's Sophie, it's a pleasure to meet you, Jake." Your nerves eased up slightly, at the very least Maddie seemed to have a level head on her shoulders, something you appreciated greatly compared to the rigid gaze of Kimberly and the blank, stupefied smile of Sophie.

"Oh it's no problem at all, I would be happy to answer any of your questions about my size honestly. It's almost always the first thing people notice about me so I'm used to it." You announced to the room. In reality you didn't enjoy talking much about your stature, because it usually lead to further demeaning questions from girls, but you knew you had to make a solid impression so you had to tough it out.

"Sure, I have one," Kimberly said out loud, "forgive me if this is rude but how exactly did you survive when I stepped on you at the front door? When I looked down and saw your tiny head peeking out from under my flip flop I expected the rest of your body to be nothing but a large stain when I lifted it up."

"Woah wait mom stepped on your entire body?! That's crazy!" Sophie blurted out.

Kimberly's vocabulary seemed downright bone chilling as she referred to you as tiny and a stain, but you shook it off and offered the most genuine response you could.

"Actually my body is for some reason or another malleable! I can withstand many times my weight without suffering any serious injuries!" You failed to mention in your response that it still hurt like hell to be crushed but you didn't want to linger on the subject more than you had to.

"Very interesting, how did you first discover this quality might I ask?" Kimberly added, her mouth forming what appeared to be a masked smile as she anticipated your response.

"Uhh well I was 7 years old at the time. Up until that point in my life my family had been incredibly protective of me, keeping eyes on my safety at every second...

*commence flashback*

That day you were helping your mom clean up some holiday decorations inside the house. By help you mean she would do almost everything and then occasionally float down pieces of colored tissue paper your family hung on the ceiling. You would collect these pieces of paper and carry them to a nearby bag of trash. Honestly it was all you capable of, standing at only around 6 inches tall at the time. Your mom was at the top of a ladder, reaching for something attached to the ceiling when her foot slipped... You had no time to react as her ass came plummeting down nearly ten feet straight towards you. *whump* she hit the ground with a meaty smack, immediately grabbing her lower back and ass in pain from the fall. The pressure on your body was immeasurable and honestly in that split second you assumed you were going to die as well, squished flat by your mom's own ass. But nearly a minute passed by until the pain subsided in your mom's butt enough for her to feel a tiny form compressed into her meaty cheek. At that moment..

11.content:
*flashback continues*

At that moment the pain of the fall all but subsided in your mom as it was replaced with nothing but gut-wrenching fear. She stood up in a snap and peered over her shoulder seeing you spread eagle across her right ass cheek, plastered face first into yoga-pants clad ass. Pure terror crept into her heart as she honestly believed she may have crushed the life out of her own son. Pinching your arm between her hands she peeled you off of her, but at that exact moment you groaned, "Ughhhhh mom what just happened?" A wave of relief washed over her as she clasped your body to her chest in a hug.

*end flashback*

"And from that moment on I knew I had something special about my body that prevented me from being hurt too badly!" You finished your story to the group. Cassie had heard this story many times before but the other three had their mouths agape at your retelling.

"Well it's good to know you aren't as fragile as you look, Jake." Kimberly responded. You could still feel the scrutiny in her voice but you could also tell at least ever so slightly that you had earned some respect in her eyes. Somehow this eased your mind slightly as you now knew that you had a chance at winning over your fiancé's mom.

"Alright everyone, "Kimberly then announced, "Cassie and Jake have driven a long way so we'll give you a rest from the Q&A if you want to unwind a bit and unpack your stuff. I'm sure the girls have their own stuff they want to do as well."

Looking at Cassie now you thought about what you wanted to do next.

On the hand you somewhat wanted to take a nap with Cassie and relax.
On another hand you were sure that Sophie or even the other two must have had more questions about your life/past/body that they wanted to ask.
Also certainly each of Kimberly, Sophie, and Maddie had their own plans for the day and you figured it would be a great idea to see if you could either help them out or try to bond with them individually.

What do you choose?

111.content:
Looking at Cassie you two pondered your next move. Before you could make a decision, however, Kimberly spoke up.

"I have a few chores I need to take care of myself so if you two need some time to unpack then go ahead. We may have an old shoe box that you can use for your clothes, Jake, or even as a bed if you desire." You were caught off guard, the other girls assumed this was a genuine suggestion from their matriarch but you knew even that was a dig at your stature. She then stood up and sashayed out of the room, her form straining the material of the sundress that she wore while simultaneously reminding you where your fiance got her looks from.

Immediately after Sophie said, "Well it was nice to meet you, I'll be by the pool if you want to hang out some more!" before standing up and literally skipping out of the room.

"Sounds like we're all splitting up so I'm gonna go practice, good to meet you dude I'm looking forward to getting to know you better." Maddie said to you next before tightening her shoe laces and exiting the room as well. You felt good about your first encounters with each of her sisters, but Cassie's mom was a different story. Turning to Cassie you said up to her,

"Welp I'd say that went pretty well! Except for the whole getting squashed flat by your mom but hey all I need is a change of clothes and maybe a shower then it's like that never happened!" You decided to ignore the somewhat cold tone of the interactions with Kimberly, knowing from your years with Cassie that their relationship was very important to her.

"Yeah I think it really did! And sorry about that, Jake, they just aren't used to someone of your size yet but don't worry they will be! Except for maybe Sophie, I'd say be careful around her when she's barreling through the house because she isn't exactly the most observant of us." Cassie continued, "Now I'm pooped how about we unload our stuff and relax a bit?"

The promise of getting time alone with Cassie sounded ideal as it always did to you, but you knew if you had a chance to win over her mom you would need to go the extra mile. So sadly you responded,

"Actually, do you mind taking my stuff to the room for me? I'm going to go see if your mom needs any help with those chores she was talking about?" You said, feigning confidence but in reality sweating with nervousness at the prospect of being alone with Kimberly.

"Wow you really are the sweetest guy in the world, Jake. I'm sure she would love that. I'm gonna go take a nap for a bit then, feel free to come join me if you finish helping out my mom" Cassie said to you before concluding with a wink. Your heart skipped a beat again at the opportunity, but you steeled your focus and simply smiled back. Cassie then stood up and grabbed your tiny backpack as well as her stuff, walking out of the room. You took the moment to stare at her backside bouncing up and down in her jean shorts until she reached the top of the stairs and was out of eyesight. Now taking a deep breath, you hopped off the coffee table and landed on the ground.

Walking around the house you followed the path you saw Kimberly take, passing through a hallway and taking note of the multiple rooms you passed by. Cassie's family wasn't extravagantly wealthy by any means but the quality of this house wouldn't have suggested that. After a minute of walking you reached what appeared to be an office and saw Kimberly sitting at a desk. You took a few steps into the room before speaking up, "Ahem, uhh excuse me Ms. Smalls?" Kimberly turned her head from the computer in front of her and scanned the room before finding your one foot tall form on the ground.

"Ah Jake, hello... is Cassie with you?" The tone of her voice seemed slightly ominous and you were almost hesitant to respond. Mustering up the courage you did.

"Uh no she's actually taking a nap, I was just coming to see if you needed any help with the chores you were talking about?"

Kimberly responded only by standing up and beginning to walk around her desk. Within a few steps you started to notice her stride was headed straight towards you, yet here eyes were on the entryway behind you. A few more steps passed by and eventually her right foot raised up, exposing you to the same sandal that pinned you effortlessly earlier. Absolutely shocked, your mind ran a million miles a sec, figuring that Kimberly must really hate you and was about to crush you once again. However, just as Kimberly planned it her foot merely hovered over your head for a brief second before moving past your body and landing on the ground behind you. As you breathed a sigh of relief she continued her gait towards the doorway you came in, reaching out with one hand and closing both you and her in the room. She then turned and stared straight at you. You had never been more nervous at any moment in your life.

"Jake, I'm going to give it to you straight, alright? I don't dislike you... but I'm worried about how well you match up with my daughter. I mean you seem nice, you really do, but you need to prove to me that you are capable of taking care of my daughter if the need be." Kimberly's matter of fact way of speaking didn't assuage your nervousness.

Choosing your words carefully, you responded, "I understand your concern, Miss Smalls, but I assure you that I am more than ready to take care of any of your daughter's needs!" The confidence you forced yourself to put on with that response elicited a nod of approval at the very least from Kimberly before she continued,

"Well that's good to hear. I do suppose what you lack in physical stature you can make up for in other ways, yes? After all, being one foot tall and malleable, as you put it earlier, means you may have some unique uses. If you can prove this to me then I will surely give you my blessing to be with my daughter."

The conclusion Kimberly came to was disheartening for you to hear. Over the course of your life you had run into your fair share of people who wished to use your special qualities for their own gain. Each and every time you had been able to escape these people and distance yourself from them in order to avoid situations like this, but at this moment that wasn't an option. You couldn't simply tell Cassie about this dark side of her mother, either, as you knew she loved her family more than anything in the world and throwing a wrench in her relationships with them was something you would never do. You steeled your resolve and tried to look on the bright side of this fate. At the very least Kimberly didn't seem outright malicious or sadistic, as certain captors in your past had been, rather just very critical with high standards to meet.

"That I can certainly do. Whatever you or your family needs that I can provide I'll be on it in a heartbeat." Your response for the first time elicited a smile from your future mother in law, something you were rather proud of. Even if that smile seemed to show a feeling of victory in her as opposed to affection for you, a smile was a smile nonetheless and better than you had received thus far.

"That's what I like to hear, Jake. Well for starters..."

1111.content:
"Well for starters the internet keeps cutting out. You're a young guy you should be pretty good with computers, right?" Kimberly asked you. You breathed a sigh of relief as your mind was spinning with possibilities as to what she was about to ask you. As far as favors go this essentially was as good as it could get for you.

"Oh yeah I can fix that no sweat!" You responded happily up to your future mother in law.

"Great, the modem and router are under my desk over there." Kimberly pointed to the workstation she was previously seated at when you walked in the room. Only then did you notice that this wasn't merely a table, but a large ornately crafted wooden desk. Taking a moment to admire the craftsmanship you noticed Kimberly begin to walk around to the other side, motioning with her hand for you to follow her. You jogged slightly to keep up with her walking pace and made it around the desk. From this side you could see that where were two large drawers with cabinets on the sides and one rather small opening for what you assumed to be Kimberly's legs as she worked. Kimberly continued, "the modem and router are on a shelf on the back in there if you want to head in and start fixing it."

You gulped slightly as you looked at Kimberly's massive legs then back to the space you would be entering. For you the area was more than big enough to fit in, but you wondered how she even managed to work at that desk considering her quite tall and curvaceous stature. But you had no time to voice any questions as you saw Kimberly's face begin to appear impatient. Immediately you walked under the desk and surveyed your surroundings. The thick wood went from the floor to the ceiling, leaving not a single smidge of an opening other than where Kimberly's chair would go. On the back wall ahead of you you saw the equipment on a small shelf elevated off the ground and began analyzing them. Taking a quick glance backwards you saw Kimberly's toes absent-mindedly drum one after another in her flip flops, a terrifying sight to behold. Turning back you began to check out the router, looking at the display as well as the wires connecting to it.

Nearly ten minutes had past and you had failed to see the light that indicated "ethernet connection" light up, frustrating you greatly. However as annoyed as you were it seemed Kimberly was even more so, as a few minutes before she had plopped her ass down in her desk chair and audibly groaned. Thankfully the chair was rolled away from the desk, but even seeing her massive lower body sat into it scared you in your current situation. At that moment you heard her phone begin to ring. *ring* *ring*

"Hello?" Kimberly said, picking up the phone. She listened for a moment before continuing, "Sure, I can send you an email with the specifications right away." You couldn't tell by the tone of her voice whether this email was for business or pleasure, but either way you were uneasy about how she was going to send this email with no internet.

"Jake? I hope you have room for some friends down there because I have to type up an email. I know my feet are as big as you are but just try to ignore them and keep working, I want the internet working by the time I have to hit send, got it?" Kimberly said down to you, not even making the effort to bend down and look at you as she said this, she simply wheeled her chair forward toward the desk. You could hear the visible smile she had on her face without even seeing it, realizing that she must have been loving causing this uncomfortable situation for you. You looked back just in time to see her kick her dirty flip flops off before scooting the rest of the way in. The combination of her chair as well as her thick calves and thighs filled up nearly every inch of remaining space left behind you in the cutout area of the desk. Kimberly plopped each of her heels down on the ground behind you, holding her soles and toes up in the air facing you. You gulped, noting that Kimberly must have had some relatively large feet as her toes were nearly at the same height as your head was. Not wanting to show the tremendous discomfort you felt, you shouted back up,

"Sure thing, Ms. Smalls, there's plenty of room for me to keep working. I'll have this fixed in a jiff." You feigned confidence but the toes nearly touching your face as you said that were putting you on edge.

"Great, you really might be a useful little guy after all." Kimberly said with a smirk as she began typing away. You attempted to resume your work as well, unplugging and replugging various switches in hopes that something would finally click into place. A few more minutes passed by and you were beginning to feel quite hot and claustrophobic. While Kimberly had yet to actually make contact with your body with her feet, the fact that they were mere inches away from your entire body mean that you could feel the heat emanating from them. At that moment you made a fatal error, leaning backwards to wipe some sweat off your brow you felt your head smack softly into the underside of Kimberly's left big toe. Before you could even recover Kimberly seemed to seize the opportunity and began rubbing this toe all over your head, thoroughly messing up your hair and also seemingly transferring some of her foot sweat to you.

"Oh Jake how did you know my foot itched in that exact spot!" Kimberly said, clearly lying but not wanting to waste an opportunity to mess with you. "I mean, you must have done that on purpose, right? I assume you did because you said you were willing to do, and I quote, whatever me or my family needs earlier. I assume that's still true or else you would be a bit of a liar, wouldn't you, Jake? And I certainly wouldn't want a liar as a son in law." Kimberly's manipulative wordplay absolutely crushed you. She had essentially locked in your role as a slave for her own use and you had to put up with it. As bad as this seemed, Cassie was and is the love of your life, and you would put up with anything if it meant staying with her.

"Uhh yep! All on purpose, I just had a feeling you could use a good scratch and I'm always here to help!" You responded with a forced happy tone. Kimberly smiled deeply, entrenching you further in her trap as she responded.

"That's so wonderful, Jake. I hope you don't mind but the other foot itches as well." Kimberly lifted her right foot off the ground and rubbed it all up and down the right side of your body. Now with her left foot rubbing your head and her right foot rubbing your body, you felt overwhelmingly claustrophobic. The one thing you were grateful for was the fact that she had not yet applied enough pressure to squash you flat, rather content with only rubbing her sweaty soles all over you instead. You figured she really did want you to complete your task of fixing the internet connection, so despite the horrific circumstances you pressed on.

How do you fare with completing the rest of your favor?

Maybe her earlier idea was spot on, you could make a good shoe cleaner!
11112.content:
You wiped a droplet of sweat from your forehead as you labored away trying to fix the internet. You weren't sure at this point if it was your own or Kimberly's as your hair was slick with her sweat. You couldn't figure out why no connection was getting through as all the power and provider lights were showing green, only the ethernet node was a blank black. The pressure of the situation wasn't helping one bit, as not only were Kimberly's thick legs and large feet burning you up with their body heat, but her soles were constantly stroking you, knocking you to and fro between them like you were some kind of toy. Put these two things together and you had a real mess, a totally unproductive work space for you to operate under.

Kimberly stifled her snickers above, genuinely surprised she had gotten you to agree to this much and relishing in the uncomfortable situation she was putting you through. Wanting to keep pushing the envelope, and really enjoying the feeling your squishy body gave against her aching soles, Kimberly began pressing her soles closer together bit by bit. Feeling you take a step forward, Kimberly simply hovered her soles along with you, not wanting to miss out on your incredibly entertaining squirms as you attempted to wiggle your way away from her.

Trying to get a closer look at the reset instructions, you nudged her big toe out of your face, thankfully giving you a chance to breath some air that wasn't directly from the underside of this mother's dirty foot. Feeling your rude push against her rubbing, Kimberly took this chance to scrunch your head with her toes, shouting down to you, "Ohh I'm not bothering you am I, Jake? My feet are still kinda itchy and you just feel sooo good down there I can't help myself from scratching!" She continuously began wiggling her toes playfully causing them to dance against your face dropping light pearls of sweat and dirt onto you. You gulped, wondering if this was some kind of punishing taunt for pushing her toe and decided you needed to double down on sucking up to her if you were going to get her to come around to considering you family.

You tried to imagine Cassie's motivating face as you managed to sputter out, "Bothered? N-no way! I hardly even remembered you were there!" Ironically, right as you said this a huge sweat droplet dribbled off her toe into your hair, which you were forced to ignore as you finished, "Whatever feels good, keep doing!" You winced, cursing yourself for always going over the top when you didn't need to. Kimberly smirked overhead as she had essentially just been giving permission to have free reign with your body. "Oooookay, if you insist, Jakey. Feel free to stop whenever you want; I'll only be a little disappointed in you if you fail but I'm sure that's whatever to you..." Kimberly squeezed you between her soles gently as she emphasized 'little', giving you the message clear as day you'd never hear the end of it if you stopped now.

As fifteen minutes passed with you unable to work properly, Kimberly had essentially turned your head into a toe toy and your body had become some kind of sole scratching post. Realizing she was nearing the end of her email, Kimberly bit her lip as she glanced into the corner of her screen and saw her internet was still not up. Knowing she was mostly at fault for her problem at this point, Kimberly began searching around for her own solution. Seeing a small yellow wire laying limply against the table, Kimberly leaned forward, analyzing where it had fallen out of.

Unaware what she was even doing, Kimberly clicked the small wire back into place, at the back of the desktop and to her surprise and enjoyment, she saw the internet symbol on her computer flip to it's 'connected' symbol! Your eyes had been squinted close, to prevent the onslaught of moist sweat from dripping into them, but you immediately made out the flashing green light for ethernet as it came to life before your face! You mentally cheered, almost crying tears of joy as you realized your torment in this hot and sweaty compartment was finally over!

Squirming your way out from between her still playing soles, you shouted out "Looks like my work here is done! It really wasn't all that hard for a smart guy like me!" before you headed towards the light marking the exit. Catching you easily, Kimberly simply extended her legs, pressing her right foot into you, squashing you between it and the hard wooden desk wall across from her. Leaning over to feign a glare at you, Kimberly stated, "Oh no you don't. Not only did I have to fix this problem all on my own, but you just lied to me!" You went deep red in embarrassment, stumbling over your words looking for a good excuse before Kimberly interrupted you continuing, "I can't believe my daughter is engaged to a little liar! You promised me a favor, and I got nothing in return! What am I supposed to do with you now?" Your heart dropped into your stomach as you felt you'd really gotten yourself into hot water now. Willing to do whatever it took to salvage this relationship, you cried out, "I'm so sorry, Ms. Smalls! I'll do anything if it means you'll find it in your heart to forgive me!"

Kimberly drummed her meaty toes against your face, clearly deep in thought about what she wanted to make you do now. Glancing down at her dirty flip flops, Kimberly briefly considered putting you to work on cleaning them. Seeing the dark imprint of her foot on the sole, she wondered if your tongue was just what was needed to scrub out the years of collected dirt and grime. Feeling you squirm against her foot however, Kimberly decided she wasn't quite done with using you in a more hands-on approach. Pretending to huff disappointedly Kimberly pressed you into her foot intimidatingly before speaking out, "Alright, Jake. I'll give you another chance. I think my feet were so itchy because they were in deep need of some tender loving care and you might be just the right size to accomplish that. You think even you can handle that?" You whimpered, nodding yes sheepishly before she smirked responding, "Good. Now I'd better feel a few thousand kisses down there if you expect me to forgive you for lying to me too!"

Kimberly scooted her chair back in, pressing her feet painfully into your body before opening up a new email to write. You nervously pressed your face forward against her crushing embrace, running your lips into the moist ball of her foot. You continued to pelt her sole with your kisses, unfortunately gagging as you felt a trace of her dank sweat leak it's way into your mouth. Kimberly kneaded her soles against you, feeling you squish like putty beneath her tired feet. Using you as some kind of foot stress toy, Kimberly decided she wanted to push you just a bit further. Seeing her gorgeous face once again slip beneath her desk into your view, you almost hallucinated she was Cassie before you snapped back into this painful reality. "Ummm. yea that's cute and all, Jake, but those aren't exactly the types of kisses I meant." You swore you saw her wink at you before she swooped her head away back into the normal world.

You prayed for salvation as you let your tongue hang out before loosely running it into Kimberly's dripping sole. You swore you felt your tongue seize up as the salty, stinky residue coating her foot tainted your entire mouth in it's overwhelming power. Her tanned and toned but still curvy body was accentuated wonderfully by her sports bra and compression shorts. You took note of all this impassively, as you only had eyes for Cassie, but you still noted it nonetheless.

Returning Maddie’s smile, you spoke up. “Cassie told me you love exercising and sports, right?”

Maddie smirked, and Sophie giggled. The blonde elbowed her big sister and grinned at you. “Love might be putting it too lightly, little cutie!” Sophie teased.

Cassie sighed. “We’ve never been able to curb her enthusiasm, that’s for sure. She just kept playing one sport after the other, and visits the gym almost every day.”

Kimberly crossed her arms under her abundant chest in a display of pride. “She wins almost every tournament and competition she enters.”

Maddie threw up her hands. “I AM right here, and can answer his question.” She pushed the still giggling Sophie off of her and addressed you. “Yeah, Jake, I like sports. Why did ya ask?”

You struck a confident pose. “Well, I was thinking we could play something out back right now, if you aren’t busy. I’d love the chance to stretch my legs.”

Maddie’s eyes widened, and you could tell she was very intrigued in your offer. Sophie bit her lip and grinned, clearly imagining the logistics of someone of your size playing with a towering girl like Maddie. Cassie thought of that too, and flashed you an uncertain frown.

“I’m not sure if–” Cassie began, but Kimberly cut her off.

“Now, now dear. Jake issued the challenge.” Kimberly explained, eyeing you closely. It was as if she was judging whether or not you backed down.

Maddie’s eyes lit up at the word ‘challenge’, and she hopped to her feet. “You’re on, Jake. Show me what you can do, little guy.”
Your cocky smile wavered under her intense aura. “Uh…I never really said ‘challenge’, but I guess–”

“Great!” Maddie turned on her heel. “Follow me then!” She motioned to you and then strolled out of the room. Taking one last second to glance at your fiancée, you leapt from the table and followed your future sister-in-law out of the living room and towards the back door. You thought you caught a glimpse of Kimberly smirking from the corner of your eye, but couldn’t double check to be sure that’s what you saw.

Maddie set a fast pace on the way to the backdoor, and it was hard for your tiny legs to keep up. Harder still was focusing in front of you and not on her tight butt swaying as her powerful legs carried her forward. It was a sobering thought to realize that a simple misstep could cause her to trip and fall backwards, her butt pulverizing you into paste in an instant. You’d gotten used to your size difference in comparison with Cassie, but three new giantesses in the mix were reminding you how tiny you really were.

Rushing through the backdoor as it swung shut behind Maddie, you slid through at the last second and entered the back yard. As Cassie had described, it was pretty huge. There was half a basketball court, sizable inground swimming pool, and a decently lengthy stretch of flat, grassy lawn, perfect for playing various games and sports on. Maddie surely thought the same, as she walked right off the back porch and into the grass, with you following suit.

The brown-haired giantess approached a lone soccer ball resting in the grass, and used her toe to flick it up into her hands. You came up beside her, and fought valiantly to mask your exhaustion from sprinting through the house to keep up with her. Meanwhile, she hadn’t broken a single drop of sweat yet.

“Alright, Jake. Down for some soccer?” Maddie inquired. “Way I see it, it’s the closest thing to fair we can manage. In a foot race, you wouldn’t stand a chance. I doubt you could throw a football very far, or even lift a basketball. Wrestling would be a hilariously embarrassing fiasco for you, and I think the ripples from my breaststroke in a swimming race could drown you.”

You nodded sadly. “You’re…uh…probably right?”

Maddie smirked. “But soccer? That could be interesting. You’re tall enough to push and kick the ball, and small enough to move around my feet and steal it from me.” She pointed to a far tree, and then behind you to a tall trash can back by the door.

“My goal will be to hit the trash can.” Maddie explained. “That gives me a point. Two if I get it IN the trash can.” She joked, indicating the open lid to the trash can. “Your goal will be the tree behind me. That gives you a point.”

You jumped up and down and shook your hands. “Alright, gotcha! I’m good to go.”
113.title: The Soccer Struggle (Part One)

choices: You fly right over the fence into Miss Hilda's yard, landing in her pool.
You land in the open trash can, which Kimberly then dumps the garbage bag into!
You fall back down and land in the Smalls yard, Maddie calls the game a draw.
1131.content:
“Don’t kick the ball into Miss Hilda’s yard though, she doesn’t like us.” Maddie added. Following her finger, you noticed the adjacent house’s backyard was right near the tree. A ten-foot-tall fence blocked in Miss Hilda’s house from all sides, and there were two ‘NO TRESSPASSING’ signs hanging up.

“Who is Miss Hilda?” You wondered aloud. Maddie sighed as she set the soccer ball down and backed up ten feet from you.

“Our neighbor. She’s a teacher at the local high school, which is weird because I’m pretty sure she hates kids. She’s only, like 30 years old, but she keeps to herself all the time. I…uh…frequently kick things over her fence and into her pool on accident. I always apologize, but she keeps yelling all the same. Told me the next time I do it that she wouldn’t give whatever I kick over back. Which would SUCK.” Maddie cracked her knuckles and rolled her neck. “Basically, she's a jerk.”

Seeing her prepare to charge, you lowered yourself into a running stance, squaring up with the ball. Maddie had to stop herself from laughing, as you weren’t even visible from her perspective, entirely hidden behind the ball.

“We’ll start on three, Jake.” She announced loudly. “One, two, three!”

Right as her countdown ended, you dashed head on for the ball, running as fast as your legs could handle. This proved to be a hilariously bad mistake. By the time you were within a foot of the ball, Maddie had reached it AND kicked it, and the unyielding white and black checkered ball bowled you over, pressing your body flat and down into the grass.

Maddie was next, the titanic girl leaping forward to keep her momentum going as she guided the ball to the trash can. Her left foot rose above you, and her entire alluring body blocked out the sun momentarily, before her foot slammed down on you, crushing your head and sticking you into the grass and dirt.

The pain only lasted a second before she stepped off, but by the time you reformed and sat up, Maddie had already scored and was walking back with the ball in her hand, smiling down at you with a look of amusement and pity.

“Giving up yet?” She taunted. Thinking it appropriate considering her competitive nature, your answer was simply sticking out your tongue at her. Her eyes widened in surprise at your action, before her face broke into a genuine smile. It was that moment that you knew you’d officially been welcomed into the Smalls family by Maddie.

You squared up with Maddie again, but the second round went just as poorly as the first. You tried to catch the ball after Maddie’s kick, and succeeded in doing so to your surprise, but you hadn’t recovered before Maddie kicked it again, sending the ball and you crashing back into the trash can, squashing you flat.

When you reformed and began round three, you knew you needed a different tactic. Thinking quickly, you waited for Maddie’s signal and then stepped gracefully to the side. When she kicked the soccer ball, you leapt at it from the side, grabbing onto it and pushing it off towards the left. This messed up Maddie’s plan, and the brown-haired giantess actually slipped on the grass and fell behind you.

You couldn’t hold back a victorious laugh as you began furiously pushing the ball down towards the tree. At least, until you heard the ground shake as Maddie flipped onto her feet and came pounding back in your direction. Hearing her but not seeing her was a whole new level of terror, but there was no way you could quit with the tree in sight.

Maddie’s right leg came swinging at you from the side, and in a moment of genius, you ducked low, grabbed the ball from underneath, and jumped in the air. Her foot passed right under you, thankfully, and her missed kick gave you time to land back on the grass again and throw the ball, letting it roll the last few feet and tap the tree.

Your future sister-in-law was suitably impressed, but kept up the tireless pace. Resetting for round four, she held back this time, allowing you to approach the ball first for a change. Running up to the soccer ball, you started pushing it to the left, then curved around in the direction of the tree. Maddie casually walked forward to block your path, confident in her ability to halt your progress if she was really trying.

Once you got close enough to her, she merely stepped down onto the soccer ball, fulling halting its movement by just her one foot alone. However, you’d been planning for this, and so rolled out from behind the ball, scooped up the longest tree stick you could find in the grass, and poked it up into Maddie’s glistening right thigh.

You scraped gently at her toned thigh, just enough to elicit exactly the response you hoped for. Maddie gasped and fought down a laugh, a tickle attack the absolute last thing she’d possible expected. With her focus uneven, you shoved the ball out from under her foot, and rushed forward as Maddie lost her balance and fell onto her knees.

Pushing out from behind her, the tree was in sight and so was your second point. Kicking the soccer ball as hard as you could, it sailed right to the tree. Maddie threw herself backwards in an attempt to stop it, but missed, succeeding only in squashing you under her lean stomach. Thankfully, she noticed her mistake right away, though it did take her a moment to scratch your flattened squishy form off of her smooth, sweaty skin.

Resetting the ball, Maddie shook her head at you. “Dirty tactics, Jake.”

You shrugged. “I’m at a huge disadvantage here. I’d say it was a creative decision, not cheating.”

Maddie rolled her eyes. “Creative decision huh? Well, regardless…this is the last point. The winner is decided here. In three, two, one!”

While Maddie counted down, the backdoor swung open, and Kimberly walked out onto the porch. She was carrying a hefty bag of trash and leftover food garbage and was about to drop it into the trash can when she noticed your competition with Maddie heating up. Intrigued, she walked a little closer to view the action better, still holding the garbage bag.

Right as Maddie finished counting, you sprinted for the ball, getting it in your hands and veering right. Maddie jogged into your field of view, and you saw her prepare to head you off with a kick. Expecting this, you grabbed the ball tightly and stopped it in place, hoping Maddie would miss her kick and trip herself again.

You couldn’t have been more wrong. As soon as you stopped, you saw the smirk on Maddie’s face and realized you’d fallen into her trap. Stood still, you made an easy target, and Maddie wasted no more time in stomping down onto your body right her right foot, crushing you flat in an instant. On the porch, Kimberly nodded approvingly.

Removing her foot, Maddie gave your mashed body a sympathetic smile. “Sorry, dude, but I don’t give anyone anything for free. You put up a hell of a good match, honestly. It’s been fun, but I’m competitive through and through, and I do what I need to to win. Call it…a creative decision!” She grinned and winked at you, before pulling back her leg for the mother of all kicks. From her stance, it was clear she was trying to hit the ball to the trash can in one move.

With the last ounce of your stamina, you let out a defiant cry and popped back into shape just in time to push the ball out of the way, hoping your last-ditch effort would mess up Maddie’s kick and buy you a few extra seconds. Or, that was the plan in your head. In reality, you failed to consider the horrible ramifications of moving the ball after the athletic giantess had already begun her kick.

You didn’t even have time to blink, and Maddie only had a fraction of a second to cry out in surprise as you moved the ball right as she kicked. Her foot impacted like a bullet the size of a boulder, slamming into your one-foot-tall body and propelling you into the air. You nearly passed out from the impact alone as you flew through the air, pinwheeling uncontrollably. Maddie had no time to react to her target changing from the ball to you, and had not held back one bit on her thunderous kick.
1131.title: The Soccer Struggle (Part Two)

choices: Hilda actually gives you time to reform and you get to speak to her.
Hilda begins studying your body, putting you through various tests.
Hilda shoves you in a bag, deciding to take you to her school and use you there
11311.content:
Hurdling through the air at supersonic speeds with a large shoe-shaped dent running along your entire torso, you could barely even tell what was up and what was down. You caught a flew glimpses among your hundred of tumbles of Maddie holding both hands over her mouth and staring up at you, but she was getting increasingly further away. As you reached the apex of your flight you finally started to stabilize and looked down to see that you had soared clean over the imposing fence you saw earlier. Thankfully from what you could see you were aimed for a pool as opposed to any other surface which you would have certainly squished flat against. After plummeting for a few seconds you finally landed in the water with a loud splash. You sank beneath the water for a few seconds but thanks to one of the few benefits of being so light and small you quickly rose to the surface.

With your entire chest still caved in from Maddie's cannon of a kick, you didn't quite have control over your body yet. This being the case, you stared up into the blistering mid day sky for a few moments before a surprisingly large shadow was cast over you. Opening your eyes widely you saw the outline of a woman leaning over you from the edge of a pool. Gulping with fear from what little you had heard about Miss Hilda, you tried desperately to get any words out, but with your whole torso still decimated by Maddie your lungs just wouldn't push the air up through your vocal chords quite yet. Suddenly a hand reached down and grabbed your body, shaking some of the water off of you before holding you up to face this mystery woman.

The sight of the woman staring at you inquisitively was bizarre to say the least. First and foremost her body was impressive. While not cut from the same outrageously curvy cloth as the Smalls family, she still had shapely breasts and rather wide hips that led to a large ass that you even begin to see from the front. All this was hidden behind a relatively modest white t-shirt and denim shorts, but nonetheless you could tell she was an attractive woman. However, contrasting the youthful look of her body was a mess of what looked like short hair dyed grey? She had a rather angular, pretty face as well, complemented by a pair of large, circular glasses. If you had to guess you would have said that it seemed like this woman was trying and failing to achieve the mad scientist look, but her natural youth and beauty still won out in the end.

Shaking you out of your trance, the voice of the woman rung out in front of you, "What the hell, is this seriously a doll? All of the Smalls daughters have to be way too old to be playing with dolls at this point. Is that pain in the ass Maddie trying to mess with me or something? I swear that girl needs to stop throwing her shit into my yard!"

You could tell by the tone of her voice that this woman was not a friendly person to be around. The disdain in her voice when she even said the names of the Smalls was evident, and now you felt twice as terrified to be where you were. She quickly dropped her arm down to her side and began to walk briskly towards her house. Swinging you unconsciously as she walked, she bumped your body into the side of her hip multiple times, slamming your still deformed body into her soft skin. You couldn't even take in your surroundings due to the repeated contact you kept making with her, as she quickly walked through her house and out her front door. Stepping out into her front yard she stopped suddenly, holding you still long enough to see none other than Maddie standing a few feet ahead of you both! It seemed like Maddie had ran all the way from the Smalls' backyard up to the front of this Miss Hilda's house as soon as she realized what she had done to you. You smiled at least knowing that the sister of your fiance seemed like she genuinely cared about your well being. But that didn't change the tension in the air at that exact moment. It was clear that Miss Hilda did not like Maddie one bit.

"I'm guessing this is yours, then?" Miss Hilda said, her voice dripping with annoyance.

"Yes I am so sorry it was a complete accident! I'll never even play a sport in my backyard again if you just give it ba..." Maddie pleaded but Miss Hilda cut her off.

"As I told you last time this DOLL or whatever I am holding will not be returning to you! In fact, maybe this will teach you to be more considerate of personal space!" With her final word she threw you aggressively onto the concrete step down in front of her, before immediately raising a large, pale, bare foot above your body. You could only whimper with fear as she brought the ball of her foot down hard onto your face, before immediately lifting it up and repeating the process with the rest of your body. She stomped for nearly ten seconds straight, concluding the beatdown by twisting her heel over your now totally flattened body.

Maddie was speechless at the violent display that her neighbor displayed. She always knew that she was a grumpy woman, but this was outrageous. Shaking herself out of shock she yelled back, "Miss Hilda that isn't a doll that is a real person he has a special condition that makes him that size!"

Now just standing with her foot planted firmly over your entire body, this woman furrowed her brows in curiosity. She removed her foot and peered down at your now completely flattened body. Bits of dirt and other grime from the bottom of her soles had rubbed off all over your body during the stomping, smearing some of your features slightly, but for the most part you still maintained your features. She bent down and used a nail to scrape your head free from the ground, peeling your body up like a human pancake. She took one more look at you and waved your flattened form around before responding.

"Yeah right I'm sure you just said that to get me to give it back. Not a chance! Better think twice before launching something in my yard again, unless you just like giving me gifts!" Miss Hilda then immediately spun around and walked the few steps back into her house. Maddie tried to plead more and chase her to the door, but the woman slammed and locked the front door shut before Maddie could reach. Now holding you in her hands she gave you an inquisitive look once more.

There's no way you're a real person... right?
11311.title: Behind Enemy Lines

choices: Hilda herself decides to demonstrate your squishiness and stretchiness.
Hilda asks for volunteers to test your gummy-like body's durability.
*Writer's Choice*
113113.content:
Miss Hilda’s inquisitive look, quickly faded, replaced by a bemused smile and a roll of her eyes. Whatever small kernel of curiosity she’d felt at Maddie’s emotional plea was squashed within her by common sense and reason. There was no scientifically possible way in which a one-foot tall squishy person could ever exist. Maddie was clearly playing an elaborate prank, though Hilda had to admit, she was a gifted actress.

Shrugging her shoulders, Hilda walked over to a sling bag she kept near the front door, zipped it open, and slammed your squishy body inside. Instantly, you slipped under a few books and other knickknacks in the bag, the heavy weights pressing you down and ensuring your reformation was impossible. You tried twitching and squirming, but to no avail. Worse, your head was pinned under a thick textbook, keeping your mouth squashed flat.

Hilda zipped her bag back up and sighed, glancing out the window. Maddie was still fruitlessly pacing back and forth, and Miss Hilda almost thought she saw tears spring to the girl’s eyes. A twang of guilt pierced her frozen heart, but Hilda shook it off, content in believing she was in the right holding onto the Smalls girl’s weird doll. She’d given her plenty of warning, and this was only fair recompense.

Miss Hilda made sure to position the bag in a way in which she’d remember it the next morning, as she planned to take it to school the next day. Hilda taught Math and Science, and was already wondering if there were any unique ways to test and experiment with the odd gummy-like doll’s special properties. Her intellectual side was thrilled at the prospect, and she hoped her students shared her enthusiasm.

Strolling over to her comfortable fireplace recliner, Hilda settled in for the evening. She’d heated up a scrumptious casserole dinner earlier, so she flicked the TV to an ambient music channel and lost herself in an enjoyable book. Hours passed by in relaxing peace and quiet. The front door rang three times, and her house phone buzzed twice, but Hilda didn’t spare any thought to Maddie’s desperate attempts to contact her.

Meanwhile, Maddie was simultaneously doing everything she could to rescue you, and also doomed you to your fate. She knocked and rang at the front door, looked up Hilda’s number in an old phonebook and called her, and contemplated sneaking in through an open window or unlocked door, before being dismayed by Hilda’s state-of-the-art security system installed all over her house.

The crucial thing that Maddie did NOT do was run back over to her house and tell Cassie about what had happened. She didn’t even tell Kimberly or Sophie. She was wracked with guilt and embarrassment, and could already picture Cassie snapping and screaming at her. Instead, as night fell, she put on her best performance as an excited sister and managed to successfully distract Cassie from thinking about you by talking and watching a movie. She promised herself to continue trying to save you first thing in the morning.

Double meanwhile, you could do nothing but waste away in Miss Hilda’s bag, impatiently waiting for her to return for you. Trapped under books in the bag’s tight confines, you couldn’t move or reform from your crumpled-up shape. Night came and went, and eventually you were able to find a bit of sleep, as uncomfortable as it was. All told, it was over twelve hours in Miss Hilda’s bag, before morning came.

In the morning, Miss Hilda awoke bright and early, freshened up in the bathroom, helped herself to some wake-up coffee, and dressed in her typical outfit. Her outfit consisted of a modest white blouse and black skirt, topped off by her trademark scientist’s overcoat. Of course, her blouse and skirt could only be so modest taking her beauty into consideration, as her top strained to hold her chest in, and her skirt’s seams stretched taut around her derriere.

Strolling downstairs, Hilda enjoyed a quiet breakfast with some juice and a bagel, then slipped into her heels and approached the front door. Smirking a bit upon seeing her sling bag, she was reminded of the squishy doll inside, and the plans she had in store for it. She gathered up her belongings, sliding the bag over her shoulder, and walked outside to her car.

You could feel yourself jostled around inside the bag as Hilda moved to her car, but you weren’t shaken enough to escape being pinned by the books holding you flat. All you could do was listen to the muffled sounds of her humming, and the engine of her car starting. You could feel the rumbling vibrations of her car pulling away from the driveway and down the road, off towards the direction of the high school.

Lying in her bed back at the Smalls house, Maddie shifted. She was deeply asleep, and the low rumble of a car engine stirred her slightly. The brown-haired girl groaned quietly, turned over, and buried her head in her pillow. The annoying sound soon faded, and Maddie sleepily grinned, falling into her deep, uninterrupted slumber again. Any conceivable thought of you was the farthest thing from her mind.

Making it to the high school, Miss Hilda parked in the teacher’s lot and headed into the building. Her school, Carson High, was a modestly sized and reasonably advanced school consisting of a large central building, a self-contained gym, track, and pool building, and a third building for the large auditorium. In the center of the three-building complex was a pretty and relaxing garden yard, where activities were frequently held.

For some reason that no one could really explain, the student body was almost entirely female, to a staggering degree. This had the side effect of making any male presence a huge deal, and Miss Hilda had witnessed firsthand the torrent of pent-up feminine desires being unleashed. Perhaps that was why males were so scarce on the campus, but none could say. Hilda almost had small shred of sympathy for a man who found himself here. Most of the staff were females too.

She had no qualms with her fully female students though. They were attentive, thoughtful, invested in the classwork, and enjoyable to be around. As she lugged her belongings up to the third floor of the main building, Miss Hilda shoved open her class door and turned on the lights, eagerly awaiting her student’s arrival so she could show them the odd doll…thing…she’d been so graciously gifted by Maddie Smalls.

For the first time in what seemed like forever, you were released from your confines in the bag as Hilda dumped out her books onto her front desk. You were a crumpled lump at this point, but happy to be free to reform once more. That happiness faded in an instant though, as Hilda grabbed you up and absentmindedly toyed with you in one hand while she straightened her desk space, using you like a stretchy stress toy.

Some more time passed, and students began milling into the room. Miss Hilda greeted each one with a curt “good morning”, but her eyes betrayed her sense of excitement. The students, in turn, waved happily and answered her back, even the more sullen and quiet students. Girls of all types poured into the room: outgoing and extroverted, studious and introverted, flirty, goths, pranksters, and everything in between. All told, twenty teenaged girls comprised Miss Hilda’s class.

The bell rung, and Hilda shut her classroom door. She tapped the whiteboard behind her to command attention, and then cleared her throat. Twenty sets of eyes looked at her expectantly, more than a few drifting to the odd tan lump in her hand.

“Good morning students.” Miss Hilda addressed the class. “I’ve got something exciting today, so I won’t delay any longer.” Unceremoniously, she dropped you from her hand onto the desk, letting you rest in a misshapen blob. You wasted no time beginning to reform.

A wide-eyed girl in the front of the class titled her head. “What is that, Miss Hilda?” She inquired.

“That’s what is so exciting. I’ve no idea!” Miss Hilda’s eyes lit up. “I…found it…just yesterday. It’s a strange, squishy substance that forms into a doll when allowed to rest. Observe.”

Girls leaned forward in their seats, craning their necks to get a better view of you as your body’s natural processes kicked in, reinflating your crushed limbs and chest. As you popped back into your normal shape, gasps and small laughs echoed around the room. Your cheeks flared up at the humiliation of being presented as something to marvel at, but as soon as your face reformed, you could cry out and clear up this whole mess. Hopefully.

Trouble was, right before your head finished reforming, Miss Hilda grabbed your body to hold you in place, palm clenching around your head and keeping it flat, unable to talk. Your limbs were still free though, so you thrashed against her grip on you.

Another girl shrieked. “Why is the doll moving?!?”

Miss Hilda clicked her tongue. “It’s another odd property of the gummy-like substance. It reacts to touch in strange ways.” Her scientifically focused brain rationalized each and every little thing you did to a maddening degree. Though still pinned in her grasp, you had no doubt that even if you leapt to your feet and screamed at her that you were a real person, she’d find some way to still rationalize you as a doll.

A third girl’s eyes gleamed as she beheld you. “So, what can it do?”

Miss Hilda met the girl’s eager stare. “I’m glad you asked. In theory, its squishiness should work in reverse. As in, it should be quite stretchy. Shall we see just how much it can stress and squash?” Hilda proposed, and a chorus of “yes” and “yeah” responded to her.

Your struggles ceased upon hearing twenty teenage girls loudly declare their malicious, if also naïve and innocent, intentions for you. Your blood ran cold, and you paled. What on earth were you about to be subjected to?
113113.title: Miss Hilda's Class

choices: Run for it!
Try to gather your thoughts.
114.content:
As Cassie's family left the room, you collapsed backward into the couch. Even if you could have felt your legs, you wouldn't have had the strength to lift yourself up. You knew that you were probably going to be okay, having survived many close calls in the past, but positive thinking didn't really help while your arms and legs felt like they were about to fall off. There was something especially traumatic about being underneath Kimberly's flip flops. Being pinned and trapped as they ground you into the floor and the dirt and stones were stamped into your helpless body. A feeling of helplessness which you haven't truly felt since the beginning when you first learned of your strength. It didn't help with the pain though. You would do anything for Cassie, but you weren't feeling particularly attached to her family right now. Suddenly a gentle whisper could be heard from the deep, dark chasm of your suffering.

"Hey."

Forcing your eyes open, you could see Cassie there, kneeling at the edge of the couch, watching over you with tears about to trickle down her face.

"You look pretty beat up" she said.

"What me? Nooooo." You tried your best to lighten the mood and it worked. It brought a brief smile to Cassie's lips.

"Come here you. Let's get some rest." Being extra careful, she lifted you off the couch and cradled you in her arms like a baby as she began to walk. You were barely conscious as she lay you down on another soft surface. You could tell she was right next to you as the warmth of her body made you you feel cozy and comfortable and not to mention, safe.

"I'm really sorry Jake. Now get some sleep okay?" The last thing you heard before drifting off to was the beautiful and comforting voice of your girlfriend.

-------- Some time passes --------

You awakened with an immense yawn, and soon after, your jaw completely dropped. On the far side of the bed was Kimberly, standing on her knees, towering over you. That wasn't all. On your right was Sophie was standing at the side with one foot raised onto the bed. On your left was Maddie who also stood on the side with on knee resting on the bed, disturbingly close to you. The three giant women each smirked as you panicked and fell on your back. Without warning or hesitation, Sophie stood up on the bed, followed by Maddie and lastly, Kimberly also rose to her feet and the three women surrounded you. All you could see were three gigantic pairs on feet blocking your way in every direction and if you craned your neck upwards, you could see the trio laughing while looking down at you.
In an instant, they began jumping on the bed around you, causing violent earthquakes all around which threw you off balance and cause you to begin bouncing uncontrollably all around. Amid the chaos, you could hear the three girls laughing hysterically and then you understood. You were nothing but dirt to them. A toy to be made fun off. Why did you expect anything else?
Sophie's feet smashed onto the bed right next to you, sending you flying off in the opposite direction. Your body was smacked against the wooden floor as you heard one of them

"Where do think you're running off too tiny?"

It was Maddie who walked over you before you could even gather your thoughts. Her shadow loomed overhead as she lifted her giant feet and smashed down on you without hesitation. You were pummeled into the ground mercilessly by Maddie's powerful feet with no chance to beg for mercy or even catch your breath. She ground down on your completely flattened body until you were stuck to her sole. Your were barely conscious as she lifted her foot and peeled you off and onto the bed again. Tears gushed all over your face. What did you do to deserve this? "Why was I cursed to be this small? To be tortured, stomped and mutilated?"

Sophie's voice loomed overhead. "Now I know why Cassie likes you so much!" The three girls were kneeling directly over you before they each turned around, and all you saw were three gigantic asses hovering over you as you lay helplessly in the sheets.

"You ready little guy?" They descended rapidly, crushing your body like a thousand cushiony skyscrapers .

The lake was of a large enough size for their to be a sandy beachside, which the state park officials had turned into a tourist beach. It was actually a pretty popular spot back where you grew up. On the day that you and your mom arrived, there were nearly fifty people already there.

You were dressed in just a pair of swim shorts which weren’t entirely comfortable, seeing as how they’d come from a store-bought Ken doll. You were just stepping one foot into the turbulent whirlwind of puberty, and had begun to take a closer interest in girls. Your body tingled with an incredible feeling of warmth as she spoke, the faintest hint of strawberry mouthwash flowing down from her face as she talked, washing over you. Looking back to the TV, June maneuvered the menu to a practice race, and chose her character. She flexed her hands as the race began, and was frankly pretty terrible for the first few minutes. Still, she persisted, and it wasn’t long before she was tearing around the track, leaving the computer opponents trailing in her dust. She was also beginning to lean into the turns in real life, shifting side-to-side in her seat.

She had yet to grasp which button let her fire missiles though, and she ended up losing the race because an opponent blasted her with a missile from behind and sailed ahead of her. You noted her frown, highlighted in the pulsing glow of the TV screen, and something stirred in you. You didn’t want to see this angelic girl upset in any way.

“Hey, you press the square button.” You said. “To fire missiles.” June didn’t respond, and merely retried the practice race. You looked over at June. “Miss June? The square button. Hello?” You said, this time a little louder. Still, she was firmly looking at the screen. It was only then that you realized just how loud the TV music was blaring, and how soft your voice was in comparison. She couldn’t hear you at all.

Standing up, you crossed the couch until you were right beside her right leg. Her thigh seemed so smooth and soft that it took every ounce of self-control not to rub your hand along it. Instead, you hoisted yourself up onto her leg using the fabric of her short shorts as handholds, until you were standing on her lap. June glanced down at you briefly, her smile tinged with a hint of confusion, but her attention was back on the screen after a second as the race started.

She was resting her controller on her knees as she played, so you had decided to just push the button for her as an example. Walking up a bit on her soft thigh, your feet slightly sank into her flesh, nearly tripping you up. Reaching the controller, you leaned over her thumb and jabbed the square button with all your might, pushing it in.

Immediately, the missiles fired from her car, and blasted into the same computer opponent who had screwed her over last race. The opponent sailed off the track, and June slid easily into first place. You were surprised, as you hadn’t planned to shoot the missiles at anything in particular, and had merely gotten lucky. Sadly, before you could bask in your own unintentional achievement, everything went wrong.

June, with lightning fast speed, leapt to her feet, rising in joyous satisfaction after taking revenge on her opponent. Right as she stood, her legs parted a bit, and you stumbled right in between her thighs, landing on the couch as June rose. You rolled into the indentation her butt had made in the leather, hit by a wave of cherry scented perfume so strong it almost knocked you out.

“YES! Hee hee hee! Nice!” June exclaimed, beaming. A second later, her smile turned sheepish, realizing she’d fallen right into her own claims about getting too into gaming. Blushing a bit, June sank back down towards the couch, utterly headless of what lie beneath her.

It was hard to see with June blocking most of the light from the TV, but you knew she was sitting again. Crying out in a startled plea, you scrambled forward towards the edge of the couch, too afraid to venture in any other direction. Had you gone any other way, you might’ve escaped what came next, but hindsight was twenty/twenty.

June’s ass slammed into the couch cushion, just barely missing you, but her bare thighs hit the mark. Slamming down right on top of you, you found yourself squashed and buried under June’s left thigh, your body folding into a flat pancake almost instantly beneath the teenager’s smooth skin. As June settled into her seat, more weight pressed down on you, squeezing you between her supple thigh and the leather of the couch, squishing you even flatter.

Technically, June had felt you, but the unaware giantess immediately passed the feeling off as just the leather of the couch squeezing a bit under her leg. Eyes firmly fixed on the screen, she resumed the practice race, and easily achieved a victory a minute later. Not taking her gaze from the TV, she grinned and spoke.

“Thanks for that, Jake. I hadn’t tried the square button yet.” She giggled. “Silly of me, but thanks for being such a smart kid!” She rolled her neck. “How about I give it one more race, and then we’ll do that co-op I mentioned.” Not waiting for a reply, June jumped right back into another race. She didn’t have a clue in the world you weren’t still sitting beside her. She hadn’t even considered how standing with you on her lap would affect you.

Buried under her hot flesh, you tried to wiggle or squirm, but couldn’t find enough room. Her thigh sank into the soft leather of the couch, surrounding you on all sides and pressing down on you. Tears sprang to your eyes, as they usually did in these situations. You were young, and being painfully sat and stepped on was a horrible experience you dreaded constantly.

Minutes passed, until finally June’s leg peeled off of the couch with a slick ‘pop’, a sheen of sweat beginning to appear. Unfortunately, your body stuck to the back of her thigh, so you were lifted up too, not left on the couch to reform. This wouldn’t have been so terrible theoretically, had June not immediately moved to cross her legs, letting her left leg rest atop her right. You couldn’t even brace for the impact.

As her thighs collided, you were assaulted by a slamming force of slick, hot flesh from all sides. June’s supple skin squeezed tightly around you as she let her left leg lie across her right, her thighs nearly gluing themselves together due to her growing sweat. The more she focused on the game, the sweatier she became, working herself tired with her constant leaning back and forth while steering.

Her muffled cries and exclamations of success and surprise became muffled and indecipherable, everything around you muted and dark. Your own body was quickly slick with sweat, and in danger of escalating into a fever with how hot June’s flesh was growing. You didn’t stop trying to twitch and squirm, even though it grew more futile by the second. Your body was being squished flat by June’s thighs, and soon you’d be so stuck to her skin moving would be impossible, let alone reforming without her noticing you first and rescuing you.

Finally, after twenty minutes of being stuck in the sauna of heat amidst the flesh and sweat of June’s thighs, your beautiful babysitter finally set the controller down. The golden-haired girl smiled and leaned back, letting out a big sigh. She uncrossed her legs, letting them sit properly on the couch. She winced slightly at the feeling of her sweat sticking to the leather.

“Oh, I’m really sorry Jake.” June glanced at where you were supposed to be sitting. “I promised one race, yet I–” She paused, and squinted in the dark. Your absence dawned on her. “Jake? Hey, Jake? Where did you run off to?” She leaned behind the couch and flicked the light switch on. She flinched briefly at the bright lights, and when her vision adjusted, she noted that you truly were not beside her on the couch anymore.

“After that, it all resolved in minutes.” You explained to the Smalls. “She thought maybe I’d gotten bored and wanted to play hide and seek, so she stood up to try and find me. Miraculously, I peeled off her thigh and remained on the couch. While she crawled around the room looking for me, I reformed back to normal, and when she came back to the couch and spotted me, it looked to her as if nothing bad had happened.”

“How did she take the news?” Maddie pondered.

Cassie smirked. “Seems she isn’t as great a guardian as I am, huh? I’ll always be watching out for you, Jake.”

Your fiancée’s words elicited more happy squeals from Sophie, but you were a tad surprised. She almost sounded jealous that she wasn’t your first crush, but it was more likely that she’d just been caught off guard that you’d had this story and never told her. Also, you didn’t one hundred percent agree with her, but you wouldn’t dare say that out loud. Cassie was your angel, and had saved you from hundreds of horrible accidents. Still, you couldn’t count the amount of times since you’d been sharing a room with her where you woke up crushed to her, and it took her hours to find you. “Geez, Soph! Giving me a heart attack here!” Maddie put a hand to her chest, and Sophie grinned sheepishly.

“Sorry. I just finally thought of something fun.” The bubbly blonde twirled a strand of her hair as she spoke. “See, Jake’s story kinda bummed us all out, though I’m glad he told us. I suppose I wouldn’t mind.” The Smalls matriarch glanced at herself. “Lucky that I’m already wearing appropriate attire.” She said, in reference to her red blouse and black leggings.

Just as long as everyone is alright with me winning!” Her outfit was suitable for the game as is, consisting of a tight sports bra and compression shorts. Your fiancée nervously looked down at her own attire, an appealing low-cut t-shirt and jean shorts. “Uh…I guess I’m fine too. But do you really think that Jake can–”

Feeling overwhelmingly confident, you spoke up and cut off your fiancée. “I’m all in! Discreetly, you nodded your head to her, signifying that you’d be fine. Slowly pulling her eyes away from you, Cassie smiled at her youngest sister. You could see the hesitation still written on her face, but not in her voice as she spoke. “Alright, Soph! Go get the game, and we’ll move things around in here.”

Giggling gleefully, Sophie sprang from her seat and rushed out of the room. You hopped down from the table and scurried to the side of the room while the other Smalls women got to work. Maddie and Cassie skootched the couch closer to the wall and the reclining chair in the corner of the room. After a minute, Sophie returned, carrying the hefty Twister box under her arm. She nearly stepped on you as she carelessly skipped back into the living room, but you managed to sidestep her foot stomping down. She didn’t even notice, and you admittedly felt a sinking feeling deep within you that this was only a taste of what was going to come in the next hour. Dropping the box on the distant table, Sophie and Maddie pulled out the larger-than-usual play tarp and unrolled it across the carpet. Cassie dutifully set four heavy books on the corners of the tarp to keep it from sliding or rolling up during the course of the impending game.

While Cassie and Sophie got the special electronic spinner ready, Kimberly and Maddie took to stretching their arms and legs as a form of warmup before the game began. Maddie cut in, leaning forward in her seat. She spoke. “Yeah, okay, okay. Tara’s a piece of shit.” You and Cassie gaped at her bluntness, but Maddie continued. “But like, you ever actually meet someone other than your mom who was nice to you?
