The question threw you for a second. Your several previous stories had all been about bad situations with women who didn’t treat you very well. In fact, most of the stories you could run off from the top of your head were unpleasant giantess experiences, most involving Tara. Women who had molded you into something to fit their purposes, women who had treated you like a slave or some kind of inferior pet. Happy stories were few and far between.

But they still existed, and you soon recalled some. “Uh, yeah! Yes, Maddie, I did have some encounters with a few girls who were really nice to me. I’d say the closest people I had to friends growing up were Jolene Wilson and her daughter Kelly. They were our neighbors and lived just across the street.”

Sophie grinned like a kid. “Ooh really? That sounds so much fun!”

You answered her smile with one of your own. “They were pretty awesome, yes. I can tell you a bit about them.” You cleared your throat and began…

(FLASHBACK BEGIN)

It might go without saying, but your first encounter with the Wilson family was on par with your daily misadventures with your mother and Tara. Your mom invited the two over for lunch a week after they moved in, and as soon as the front door opened, Kelly stomped you flat under her sneakers and scraped away at your body, thinking you were a part of the doormat.

Thankfully, your mom noticed and peeled you free before Jolene could follow her daughter’s lead, and Kelly apologized profusely once you reformed and properly introduced yourself. That didn’t stop Jolene from accidentally sitting on you three separate times in the next twenty minutes during lunch, but you excused her inattentiveness for the simple fact that she’d never experienced being around a small squishy person like yourself. You were ten at this time, and only six or seven inches tall.

Your mom and Jolene hit it off exceptionally well, and decided on an impromptu shopping trip to the nearby mall. They left Kelly, who was fourteen, in charge of hanging out with you while they were gone, and then rushed off. Kelly carried you over to the couch and sat down beside you, instantly jumping into conversation with you, talking quickly and excitedly about music and movies.

It was overwhelming, to say the least. Kelly’s exuberance and eagerness to make friends contrasted sharply with your introverted and quiet personality. She was exceptionally pretty, lengthy black hair with bright blue streaks tied back into a ponytail, bright eyes, and tanned skin. She was tall and lean, not fully matured (as she was only fourteen), but on her way to inheriting Jolene’s considerably blessed curves.

Kelly, potentially because she noticed your awkwardness, kept the conversation simple and lively. She avoided making any comments or jokes about your height and squishiness, and it wasn’t long before her calming voice and warm expressions broke you out of your shell. By the time your mom and Jolene returned from shopping, you’d been talking with Kelly for two straight hours, with no incidents. Though unspoken, you and her had become fast friends.

Of course, Jolene plopped right down onto the couch and kicked her feet up after arriving back from the mall, pulverizing you under her weighty derriere without a second thought. Kelly yelled at her mother and saved you in seconds, cradling you in her palms as you reformed. Jolene sincerely apologized, and you spent another hour talking to and getting to know her.

Jolene was the manager of a local gym, and taught yoga classes on weekends. Kelly was about to start her sophomore year of high school, and she had just started dating a girl named Rina. Kelly blushed profusely hearing her mom gush about how adorable her daughter and Rina had been when they confessed their feelings for each other at the school dance. At the time, you were a bit sad to hear that the beautiful girl you’d just befriended was taken, but you truly felt nothing but happiness for her.

Leaving your house that evening, Kelly promised to come over the next day and play video games with you, and Jolene gave your mom an all-expenses paid pass to the gym she managed. In just the span of one afternoon, you and you mom had found new friends that you’d cherish for the next few years of your life.

(FLASHBACK END)

“Kelly was easily my biggest friend, for years.” You paused, noting your unintentional joke. “Literally, biggest friend.” Sophie giggled at your bad pun, and Maddie and Cassie rolled their eyes.

Maddie cracked her knuckles, a clear unconscious habit. “You took up the free gym pass, right? Can’t miss that chance.”

“Oh, for sure.” You nodded. “My mom and I got a lot of use out of it. Though, half of the use I got out of it was plastered to my mom’s yoga pants, crushed into her sneaker like an insole, or scrubbed along her body like a sweat rag. Somehow, whenever she went to that gym, something messed up would happen to me. But, if Kelly tagged along too, she’d get me out of any jam I was in.”

Cassie nodded her head, appreciating the helpfulness of your childhood best friend. “Kelly always looked out for you, huh? Like a guardian angel?”

“Kelly was amazing.” You agreed. “If my mom stepped on me, she’d notice me immediately and point me out. If Jolene had a weird ‘itch’ on her butt that she kept scratching, Kelly would politely inform her that it was actually my mushed body. Kelly and I hung out at least once a week or more for years, and I could never thank her enough for all the times she got me out of messes.

“Of course, she wasn’t flawless, no one is. I don’t blame her. Once she threw me into the laundry on accident, and I came out nearly ironed into a pair of her panties. She wore me twice before noticing me. Another time she squeezed me into her purse to sneak me into a movie theater for free, forgot I was in there, and pulled out my balled-up body, thinking I was a gumball she’d set aside earlier. It was halfway through the movie that she realized she’d been chomping on me the whole time, but as she didn’t want to risk losing me in the pitch-black theater, she had no choice but to keep gnawing away on me for another hour.

“Kelly could also be a bit distracted when she was around Rina, her girlfriend I mentioned earlier. They’d get lost in each other’s eyes, and nothing interrupted their make-out sessions, not even if I unintentionally ended up between them.” You paused your recollections. “Rina was really funny, and we were good friends too. She’d play with and tease me a bit, but not like Tara. More like a mischievous older sister.”

Sophie rocked on her heels. “What happened to Kelly? Do you still hang out with her?”

You shook your head sadly. “Last I saw her was when she went off to college with Rina. Some university across the country. She was pursuing a degree in physical education, probably following in her mother’s gym ownership steps.” You took a deep breath. “The hug she gave me when I watched her drive off lasted nearly ten minutes. We were definitely both pretty weepy.”

Cassie and Sophie ‘awwed’ at your touching story, and Maddie seemed satisfied. “She sounds like an awesome person. Glad not every girl in your life was out to ruin your day.” She smirked, trying to bring back some levity. “I mean, I ain’t above pranking and messing with Cass and Soph, but I wouldn’t stoop to the lows of someone like Tara.” Maddie eyed you directly with a glint in her eyes. “Watch your back, though. I won’t wait long to spring some pranks on you.”

You laughed. “I’ll try to be on my guard!”

Meanwhile, Kimberly had a bemused expression on her face, and like usual, you couldn’t read what was on her mind. After a moment, she leaned forward in her chair and spoke.

“Actually, Jake, you’ve reminded me of something because of your story…”

Almost acting out a scene in an old cartoon show, your legs frantically scrambled on the rapidly spinning treadmill, until you finally lost your balance. Your body flew through the air across the shed, until finally coming to a stop by impacting against a wide yoga mat hanging up on the opposite wall.

The impact was immense, and your squishy body flattened out in the blink of an eye. You’d hit it from behind, so your back crumpled into a lump, leaving your face visible and looking out. Your malleable form, having hit the soft yoga mat with the impact of a bullet, nearly glued itself to the mat instantaneously, and as soon as your rattled brain calmed down, you began focusing on reforming. At this point, you were merely embarrassed you’d bumbled into such a silly accident, though you did notice with some alarm that the yoga mat was tan, as apparently nearly everything was that the Smalls women owned.

As you were reforming, your vantage point allowed you to look across the entire shed. Maddie was balancing delicately on her yoga ball, apparently stretching out her back. Kimberly was pedaling away at a brisk but pleasant pace on the exercise bike. Neither giantess had so much as noticed or heard your little accident on the treadmill. Much to your dismay, you also noticed the treadmill slowly powering down. Apparently, a built-in power-saving feature shut it down after a minute of not detecting any use. There went that possible avenue for someone to notice your accident.

Some minutes passed, and you expected to pop free from the yoga mat you’d slapped into and fall to the floor any second. After all, the mat was hanging sideways on the wall, so there wasn’t even any pressure on you. However, you underestimated just how forcefully you’d been thrown into the mat by the treadmill, not to mention the soft fabric of the mat combined with your own sheen of sweat. You hadn’t just been crushed by the pressure, but also a bit of sticky sweat was holding you in place.

Still, you held onto hope that you’d reform soon, and stop being just comically squashed sticker on the yoga mat. Or at least, you held onto that hope all the way up until Kimberly slowed her pace on the exercise bike and hopped off. The matriarch of the Smalls family took a big swig of her water bottle, and then sauntered over to the wall, a happy smile on her face. Your blood ran cold as she drew nearer and nearer.

You tried to scream out to her, but even your mouth was still a bit mangled and incapable of speech. You could do nothing but look up at Kimberly’s towering frame with fear in your eyes as she approached the wall and grabbed the yoga mat you were stuck to. Dragging the mat out into the center of the shed, she laid it flat and stood beside it. Daintily, she brushed her foot across the mat to straighten it, dragging her damp sock across your face.

Right before she stepped onto the mat, her eyes locked with your own. Your heart leaped for joy, as you knew she’d noticed you, despite your flattened body semi-blending in with the tan color of the mat. Finally, you could stop trying to telepathically scream up at her to spot you. However, you didn’t expect her to scrunch up her brows in confusion, then look between you and the empty treadmill. And you CERTAINLY, didn’t expect a slightly satisfied smirk to cross her face.

Your heart dropped right as Kimberly looked away from you and stepped up onto the mat, the sole of her left foot slamming down onto your body. Your body cried out in pain as the full weight of your future mother-in-law bore down on you, the pressure easily pressing you down even further into the soft yoga mat. Your mind was reeling, as you could’ve sworn she’d recognized you, though it was always a possibility she had confused you for a simple sticker or design. She wouldn’t knowingly torture you like this, right?

Regardless, coherent thought went out the window as Kimberly began stretching her body into various yoga poses. Everytime she shifted her position, her foot would drag across the mat and grind your body into the fabric of the yoga mat. Sweat, alongside pieces of dirt rubbed off of her sock and onto your face, and every twist of her foot harshly mangled and smeared your face. With futile effort, you tried to wiggle and alert her to your presence, but you couldn’t manage even a measly twitch.

This continued for ten minutes, and when Kimberly finally dragged her dank foot off of you, you were much less recognizable. Your gummy-like body had been thoroughly mashed into the yoga mat to the point where you were much flatter than point, and your human features had been even more smeared away. You could only look up at Kimberly with one eye that was un-smudged, and beg the literal goddess that she was to look down and notice you. The more pressure you endured, the harder it would be to spot you on the tan mat.

Once more, you vaguely thought you saw a smirk on Kimberly’s face, but it was quickly replaced by a massive black globe. That globe was, of course, Kimberly’s monumental ass, clad in skintight black leggings, and rapidly descending towards you. Your mashed body was perfectly hidden beneath just her right cheek on its own, and the utter weight and pressure was unbearable. You could only hope that Maddie and Aria would be distracted long enough for that to happen.

Of course, right as that thought crossed your mind, disaster struck. A strong gust of wind blew across the yard, chilling you to the bone. Maddie and Aria relished the cool breeze, their hair fluttering in the wind, but you almost screamed as you felt your paper-thin body lift up from the bench and flutter into the air. With your lungs still crushed flat, you could only silently yell as your body helplessly spun out of control.

The breeze died out shortly, and the lack of wind dumped you onto the concrete basketball court right near where Maddie and Aria had begun taking turns shooting hoops. Aria was awful at it, but her unfaltering laughter and occasionally playful flirting kept the mood light and their spirits high. You didn’t know quite how to interpret their relationship just yet, but any further train of thought down the line died as soon as Maddie decided to back up for her next throw.

Still too mangled to move or scream, you were powerless as the titanic giantess backed up right into you, dirty sneakers slamming onto your battered body. The treads in her shoes and her full weight above you squashed you flat again, undoing any progress you’d made so far. Maddie, of course, didn’t feel a thing, her mind way too focused on basketball. She merely lined up her shot, jumped in the air, and threw the ball.

Her ball went in, but you barely cared. All you saw was the wholly terrifying image of Maddie leap above you, seem to float in the air, and then crash back to the ground. Her sneakers pounded against your body with relentless savagery as she landed, mercilessly squeezing your squishy body into the very cracks of the pavement. Your whole body ached with the pain and the pressure, and you silently begged for help. Sadly, Maddie stayed put atop your body.

Surprisingly you received that help from a different source. Aria, never one to shy from staring at Maddie, had clearly seen you fall onto the ground. Before she could speak, she had watched her best friend trample over you, and then stomp onto your body after her jump. Frowning, she wondered why this supposed ‘squishy fiancé’ was being treated so callously, until she caught Maddie’s eye and realized the brown-haired athlete was oblivious.

Aria rolled her eyes. “Nice shot, and nice job trampling your squishy little man, or whatever.”

Maddie paled and looked down at her sneakers, seeing nothing. Sliding her feet apart and revealing your face, Maddie felt her knees go weak. Of course, she also didn’t realize that moving her feet like that unintentionally scraped her soles across your body, harshly grinding at your malleable body and caking half your face in dirt.

“Jake!” Maddie exclaimed, stepping off of you and squatting down. “How did you even…god, man! I’m so sorry dude! I thought you were safe on the bench.” She apologized, scraping at the corners of your body to peel you up. Sadly, you were pretty ground into the cement, and she couldn’t succeed in pulling you free. Panic for her, and you, began to sink in.

Sauntering over, Aria knelt down. “I’ll get it.” She said, slipping her manicured and long fingernails between your thin and pounded body and the concrete court. Her word choice concerned you, but you were still thankful that she was helping, and soon she had you peeled free and fluttering in her hand. “Alright, I saved your…now super dirty and sweaty…toy. What do I do with it?”

Maddie grabbed you from her a bit roughly, crumping your head in her hands. “He’s not a toy. He’s Cassie’s husband-to-be, Aria. And he’s a chill guy. I think you’d like him, so be nice.”

Aria put her hands up defensively. “Chill, Maddie. Calm down. I’m sorry. Just let it…the dude…‘reform’ somewhere safe this time, okay?” Her tone of voice clearly indicated disbelief in your true existence, but that intonation went over Maddie’s head.

Maddie ran a hand through her slick hair and walked over to a water cooler lying on the ground by the court’s edge. Atop the water cooler was a small and damp wash cloth, probably set aside earlier by Maddie for her convenience. A bit carelessly, Maddie dropped you on top of the water cooler, so you feel right beside the damp wash cloth. With an almost detached sense of dread, you noticed how tan colored the cloth was.

Your fiancée’s athletic sister took a few deep breaths and filled a cup from the water cooler, downing the liquid refreshment in a single gulp. She then leaned against the cooler and locked eyes with Aria. Lazily, her hand rested on the top of the cooler, right hand resting atop your body, and unknowingly keeping you just pressured enough to not reform.

“It’s weird, ya know? Cassie coming back with a one-foot tall dude? I guess he’s attractive, and funny, and nice. I’m super happy for Cassie.” Maddie shrugged. “I don’t know though. Seems like he lives a pretty terrifying life, and I don’t know how I’d cope if I was responsible for accidentally doing something horrible to him.”

As she spoke, her fingers outstretched and curled around your body. Those fingers slowly squeezed, tightening their grip, and soon you were lifted off the water cooler and into the air. You fought with every bone in your body to twitch and wiggle in Maddie’s iron grip, but you were simply too squished and defeated to protest. All you could do was see Aria out of the corner of your eye, the Brazilian beauty watching you intently.

Aria never took her eyes off of you as Maddie lifted you off of the water cooler. Aria didn’t stop Maddie from speaking either, or alert her to what was going on. She merely tried to hide her growing smirk, especially after what unfolded next.

Eyes fully on Aria, and totally wrapped up in her mini rant, Maddie began wiping her arms with your body, slapping your face into her biceps and scrubbing you up and down her skin. Naturally absorbent and malleable, your body picked up every bit of sweat and dirt from your future sister-in-law, even as your body screamed at being squashed and rubbed in this way. That didn’t stop Maddie from moving onto her long legs next, wrapping you around her toned thighs. It certainly didn’t keep her from shoving your head back against her tight ass, the stench and swampy sweat totally overpowering you.

In her focus on talking and looking at Aria, Maddie had completely confused you for her little wash cloth, and so oblivious wiped down her entire sweaty body with your own body. She rambled on the entire time to Aria, unaware of what she was inflicting upon you.

Finally, Maddie drew to a close. “So, anyway…that’s it. I’m thinking I can win the free-throw tournament at the park next weekend.” Maddie paused. “Were we talking about something else?” Aria bit back a laugh and shook her head. Maddie shrugged. “Huh. Alright, anyway, give me a sec.”

She dropped your limp body back onto the cooler and walked away. The basketball had rolled quite a way from the court after Maddie had thrown it, so she was going to retrieve it. With Maddie out of earshot, Aria crept over to the cooler and grinned down at you, mischievous and alluring eyes twinkling. Your dazed mind barely registered her though, to worn out physical and mentally from scrubbing down all the grime and yuck from Maddie’s body.

Aria plucked you up, wincing only slightly at how soaked in sweat you were. She noted your tired face and giggled. “Credit where credit is due.” She murmured, absentmindedly stroking your body. “This little squishy toy does look like a little dude. Still, Maddie should know by now that I’m the pranking master, and a little gooey toy isn’t going to freak me out. Love her enthusiasm though.”

Aria Oliveira considered herself a master of pranking, and hardly went a day without trying to pull one over on someone. Her pranks were always lighthearted and playful, if a bit flirty, and Aria was mischievous to no end. If someone pranked her back, she considered it the biggest thrill in the world, and now she was floating on cloud nine after perceiving the events of the past fifteen minutes as one big prank. Brand new prank ideas sprang to her mind.

Gazing at you gleefully, what does Aria do next?
11512131.title: Maddie and Aria (Part Two)

choices: Maddie asks you to "team up" with her so she can win the competition
Maddie asks you to help her but lets you pick being some other item/body part
Writer's choice!
115121311.content:
With an outrageously perfect smile on her face, Aria stared down at you pondering how she could prank her best friend back. Maddie was quite a bit away still retrieving the ball as Aria's mind went through various possibilities. Just then, a light bulb flipped on in her head.

"I've got it, this stuff feels so weird I'm going to put it in her shoe so she gets all grossed out when she puts it back on! It's simple yet effective!" Still looking at you, her eyebrows lifted as she chuckled slightly, "I don't know why I'm saying this out loud instead of just thinking it, it's not like you can hear me! Sheesh, a one foot tall man? Yeah right like I would believe that for a second." Just then Maddie came back dribbling the ball towards her friend. Aria spun around, hiding you behind her back as she spoke to Maddie.

"Hey Maddie I think you should probably take your shoes off and retie them! Sometimes that helps me feel like my shoes fit better when I do that!" Immediately Maddie seemed slightly suspicious at the suggestion from her usually mischievous friend, but after thinking about it for a moment she responded.

"Not a bad idea, Aria. I guess I will!" Maddie quickly walked over to the bench near the water cooler and Aria, sitting down and unlacing each shoe individually. She slipped them both off, wiggling her toes in her long, black, athletic socks. Aria sat down beside her, pretending to take out her phone and browse some sort of social media, but secretly she was slyly reaching for Maddie's well-worn, right basketball shoe. In a flash she reached in and yanked the insole out of the bottom, grimacing as she felt the moist fabric between her fingers. She nearly gave up on the plan upon having to feel her friend's foot sweat, but there was no turning back now. She brought your body out from behind her back and dropped it immediately into the awaiting sneaker. Face up, your head must been somewhere towards the front as you were staring at mostly darkness, with a slight light beaming in from the opening away from your vision. The atmosphere in there was immediately damp, with a thick fog of sweat practically obscuring your vision. You cried mentally, wishing that for once in your life meeting someone new didn't end up with them causing you torment in one way or another. But in reality you honestly couldn't blame her for not believing you were a person, as bad as that sounds. Nobody else in the history of the world had been fully grown at one foot tall, let alone with a body made of some unidentified malleable material. Interrupting your existential crisis, Aria placed you back down secretly, right as Maddie reached for the shoe that contained you.

Picking you up off the ground, she deftly laced the shoelaces through the eyelets. Then, the moment you feared, Maddie's large foot filled the space in the opening and blocked out any remaining shred of light that flowed into your prison. You felt the heat rocket up even higher than it already was as her foot squeezed into the opening. The ball of her foot made contact with your face, pressing down onto you firmly even before the shoe was on the ground. Immediately though, Maddie tied her shoe up completely, making sure it was extra tight to prevent any possible ankle injuries while playing. This unfortunately meant her foot squeezed into your now insole form more than ever. And once she slammed her foot onto the court below, the torture increased greatly. She took a few steps, squeezing sweat out of her sock and raining down onto your form below. You were in hell in your current situation, meanwhile Maddie was in heaven.

"Woah! Your tip really did help! My shoes feel way better now! Especially this right one for some reason! It feels like it somehow got way more comfortable! Thanks, Aria." Maddie said to her good friend. You couldn't hear a word of this conversation from your shoe prison, but above in the realm of regular people Aria was perplexed. She was hoping that Maddie would take one step on top of your gummy form and be totally grossed out, but somehow it seemed like she was thankful for the prank Aria just pulled! Not knowing how to respond, Aria meekly said, "Uhh, yep, no problem!" Maddie immediately picked the ball back up and dribbled over to the free throw line. Aria stood up and walked over as well, preparing to get the rebounds for her friend as she often did.

Maddie squared up her feet, aimed at the basket, and in one fluid motion swished the free throw. Aria caught the ball out of the bottom of the hoop and passed it back to Maddie as she repeated the motion. Swish yet again. Once more they repeated it, and the outcome was the same. The duo repeated this act 27 more times, each and every time resulting in a perfectly made free throw. The duo of girls began to feel even more and more shocked, Maddie especially. She had always been a good player, but by some stroke of luck she was absolutely on fire at that moment. Meanwhile, every motion drove her feet further and further into the ground beneath her, squelching your body beneath her hefty right foot. A few minutes later as Maddie sunk her 30th free throw in a row, she finally paused to speak.

"Okay, Aria, what is going on right now!? If I shoot like this I'm going to win the free throw competition hands down!" Maddie exclaimed giddily before continuing, "What's causing this?!"

Aria, who admittedly had nearly forgotten about her squishy prank entirely, finally had her memory flood back into her brain upon hearing Maddie's question. She responded, "Oh! I put that gooey little toy into your shoe while you weren't looking as a prank! I thought you would feel it and freak out but you didn't at all! Turns out it made a pretty good insole, huh? And a super lucky one at that!"

Maddie's heart absolutely sunk upon hearing her best friend's words. She had been playing with her future brother in law inside of her shoe for multiple minutes now. Feeling incredible guilt about pressing her entire weight onto his body she immediately shrieked and sat down on the concrete, unlacing her shoe and ripping it off. Reaching in with her hand she found an edge of your body not cemented into the fabric of her shoe and managed to rip you clean out of her sneaker. Now looking at your body, it had been beaten down into nearly the exact shape of her other insole, not to mention turned slightly gray due to the influx of black fuzz from her socks mixing with her own foot sweat.

"Oh my god, Jake, I'm so sorry I had no idea you were in there!" Maddie said to you as your eyes adjusted to the light and saw her panicked face. She continued, "Aria! Jake is literally a person, not a toy! Just give me my old insole back and put him on the bench then wait! He'll turn back into a human shape you'll see!" Aria, now beginning to believe her friend's story due to the genuine panic she saw in her face, obliged, and traded you for her original insole. Maddie immediately placed her old insole back into her shoe and put it back on, taking a moment to sadly realize how much less comfortable her shoe was. Meanwhile, Aria placed you on the bench on the side of the court and sat down next to you, looking at you for a moment before turning back to Maddie. Trying to take her mind off of the torture she had just caused, she picked the basketball back up and lined up at the free throw line once again. Squaring up she shot the ball once more... and bricked it. Running to get the ball herself she tried again, and missed. Repeating the motion time and time again it seemed Maddie had utterly lost her touch, and was now practically incapable of making a shot. Meanwhile, you were slowly but surely reforming, watching Maddie miss repeatedly on the court. Aria's eyes were now locked onto you with her mouth open in shock, watching what looked like an insole slowly transform into a miniature human. A few more minutes passed and you finally unstuck your arms and legs from the rest of your body, as well as pried your mouth open, and you had finally gotten back to normal.

Meanwhile, Maddie had stormed back over to both of you in an annoyed huff. She softened for a moment upon seeing you, saying, "Sorry again, Jake, I'm glad to see you're okay." Focusing her mind back on basketball she continued, "But what the heck happened to me! I was on fire a few minutes ago, now I can't buy a single make! If I shoot like this I'll get dead last in the free throw shooting contest!" Aria seemed to have come to terms with you being a real human finally as she seemed capable of talking once again.

"Well, I mean the only difference is that... you took the toy, err, Jake out of your shoe." Aria said matter of factly. The three of you paused and looked at each other. You had yet to see this side of Maddie but deep in her mind her competitive instincts were slowly overwhelming all other common sense in her brain. You could tell her mind was running quickly as she processed the information Aria had just given her.

What does she decide?
115121311.title: A Prankster's Tool or a Good Luck Charm?

choices: Continue
1151213111.content:
Looking up at Maddie, the brown-haired giantess towered over you, her shadow cast ominously across your body. Normally, you’d be worried about her sitting on you, or any other such freak accident. This time, however, your gaze was locked purely on her face. The thoughtful and fiery expression on her face filled you with fear, and it seemed as if she was seriously considering a certain plan of action you wholeheartedly disagreed with.

Maddie’s eyes glinted with a steely look of determination, but there was some clear internal conflict going on in her mind as well. The athletic girl began chewing on her lip, eyes flicking between you and her best friend. Concerningly, her gaze seemed mostly focused on your body, and not your own eyes, like she wasn’t quite seeing you as the human being that you were.

Aria wasn’t helping matters in the slightest. Her befuddled face after discovering that you really were a real person had been replaced with excited enthusiasm, bouncing in her seat like a little kid. Her mischievous smile and playfully twinkling eyes had returned in full force, and she looked expectantly between Maddie and yourself.

Turning away, Maddie ran her hands through her hair. “No, nope. I can’t ask that of you, Jake.” She kicked at the ground and folded her arms across her chest. Aria hopped off of the bench and sidled over beside her.

“Maddie, Maddie, hey!” Aria cooed. “This isn’t a coincidence! Squishy here’s your lucky charm, girl! You can’t turn this down.”

Maddie glared at her best friend. “His name is –”

Aria waved her off. “Yeah, yeah. Listen…deny it all you want. You were a goddess of the court with that dude in your shoe. You want to win the free throw competition? Drop him back in there, and play your heart out. It’s only for a few hours…tomorrow, right?”

Maddie winced. “Yeah, three hours in my sweaty, smelly sneakers? I don’t think Jake would like to be crushed like that for so long.”

The playful giantess smiled coyly. “Ya sure? A little dude like him, pressed up against your feet for some nice, intimate playtime? Doesn’t sound so bad to me.” Maddie flushed and stammered, trying to retort. Aria only laughed melodically. “What I’m trying to say is that the cutie might be into it! He certainly wouldn’t turn down the chance to help out his future sister-in-law, right?”

The brown-haired athlete chewed her lip more thoroughly than before and looked over her shoulder at you. You hadn’t heard a word of their conversation, and so you simply spared her a happy wave. Taking one more look at Aria, Maddie let out a deep sigh and nodded in silent agreement to her best friend’s plan. She walked back to you, missing the huge grin on Aria’s face.

“Okay, Jake…I’ve got a weird request…to m-make.” Maddie said shyly, her normally extroverted and confident personality faltering. “When you were…uh…in m-my shoe, I did really, really well. When I took you out…I sucked.” Clearly embarrassed, she avoided eye contact with you. “I think you might be…a good luck charm.”

You frowned. “…ooookay? Where is this leading?” You began to feel a shiver coming on.

Maddie twirled a loose strand of her hair. “M-maybe…I could put you back in? For the competition tomorrow?”

You paled. “Back in your shoe?”

“J-just for a few hours! Your good luck rubs off on me, and I can win the free throw competition! We’ll kinda be like a team!” Maddie splayed her hands. “Honestly, I just need your help to win. I don’t care about the trophies and stuff, I just have to prove to everyone that I can do this. Without the recognition…I just feel worthless, you know?”

“R-right, I get that. I understand you, but –” You began, but were cut off by Aria pushing between Maddie and you. Maddie was confused, and you were slightly scared.

Aria grinned, ever the cheerful girl. “Give us a second, love.” She teased, gently pushing Maddie away and lightly touching the Smalls girl’s ass. While Maddie blushed, Aria knelt down in front of you, and flashed you a huge grin. In a whisper, she continued. “Help a girl out, Squishy. She really wants to win, and you’ll have some fun too, right?”

You shook your head. “I’m sorry, but willingly being squashed like that is –”

“FUN!” Aria loudly proclaimed, slamming her fist down onto the bench and pulverizing you in one terrifyingly unexpected second. In the blink of an eye, your body crunched down into a flattened pancake accordion-style as Aria pounded the bench with her hand. You didn’t even get out a single word of surprise before you’d been reduced to a gummy-like lump, your face frozen in a look of shock.

Maddie wandered back to the bench, oblivious to what had just occurred. Aria peeled you off the bench and stood up, proudly dropping you into Maddie’s awaiting palm. Maddie quirked her mouth to the side and looked at Aria intently. “He…agreed?”

Aria scoffed. “Uh, of course. He was ecstatic for the idea! A chance to help you win the competition, AND spend quality time hanging out with you? Two-in-one bonus! He even said it was going to be so much fun!”

Maddie frowned, but fought to keep the corners of her lips from curling up. “Can’t imagine it’s that much fun…for him.”

“Telling ya! The little cutie likes this squishing stuff.” Aria giggled, and Maddie’s frown faltered into a full-on grin.

Tracing a finger along your face affectionately, Maddie beamed down at you. “You have no idea how much this means to me, Jake. I’ll never forget this!”

Dropping to one knee, Maddie slipped off her right sneaker and peeled the dirty, worn insole out from the shoe. She then lowered you into her sneaker, pressing your body down into the heel of the shoe. Using three fingers she pulled and twisted on your malleable body, stretching your top half out so that you filled up the entire confines of her shoe.

Your squishy face was dragged all the way to the deepest reaches of the toe section of her sneaker, while the rest of your upper body and arms made up the middle area of the shoe. Worryingly, your flattened crotch was exactly where Maddie’s heel would be, but it was apparently far too late to let anyone know that now. Maddie contorted your squashed body to fit in as her new insole perfectly, and you could already feel trace remnants of sweat adhering to you. This was to say nothing of the smell.

Maddie carried her right sneaker over towards the back door of the house, and placed it down on the ground. She also slipped off her left sneaker and laid it beside the one you were trapped in. Bending down, she retrieved her sweat cloth from earlier and stuffed it into the sneaker, filling up the space inside and pressing down on your flat body.

“Hey, so…uh…Jake” Maddie cleared her throat. “The competition is early tomorrow morning. Seeing as how it’s nearly 6:00 PM right now, I figured you could just stay in my sneaker all night and be ready for when I put…uh…you on in the morning. Maybe you could get accustomed to the shape you’re in, and it won’t be so bad tomorrow. The cloth is just to keep you from reforming…otherwise I’d have to reshape you all over again tomorrow.”

“Good thinking, Maddie!” Aria laughed, patting her friend on the back. “Speaking of, I should run back home. I’ll definitely be here bright and early tomorrow for the competition.”

“Thanks.” Maddie smiled, giving her best friend a long hug before parting ways. Aria sauntered out of the yard and back towards her own house, but not before giving her friend’s worn sneakers a last, mischievous look. Maddie headed inside and straight towards Cassie, knowing she’d need to distract her older sister for the next few hours until bedtime so Cassie wouldn’t worry about your mysterious disappearance.

Meanwhile, that left you to lie out in your cramped confines, squishy body contorted to be the perfect insole in Maddie’s smelly old sneaker. The sweat cloth pressing down on you certainly did it’s job keeping you crushed and unable to reform, though you’d hardly made out a word Maddie had said in her little speech earlier. Most of her words had been muffled. Context alone let you know you’d be here for quite a while.

Your mind was still reeling over what Aria had done. You’d wanted to help Maddie, of course, but the squashing and crushing had deterred you. Still, Aria had slammed you down without a thought, and lied to Maddie about your welcoming compliance. Fun, she’d claimed you had said. Nothing about this was fun, and you firmly knew now that Aria and her unceasing desire for pranks and mischief spelled trouble for you.

With nothing to do but sit in silent darkness, you slipped into sleep an hour later.
1151213111.title: All In For The Win (Part One)

choices: Maddie: "Thanks so much, Jake! Now, let's get you out of there."
Aria: "Nice helping Squishy. Think Sophie or Kimberly could use 'help' next?"
Sophie: "Oh gosh! These are so dirty! I should clean them out for Maddie!"
11512131111.content:
When the morning came, you had no idea, stuck as you were in total darkness and silence. Your only clue was the most obvious, as the sweat cloth was removed from the sneaker, and a streak of sunlight shone through. That sunlight was immediately replaced by the sight of Maddie’s foot, clad in what frighteningly appeared to be the exact same ratty and sweaty black socks from the previous day, slink into her sneaker.

Her foot settled onto your body, squeezing the very life out of you. The sole of her right foot pressed down onto your chest, and her toes wiggled excitedly, dancing across your face and repeatedly slamming into your eyes. Sure enough, her heel also dug painfully into your crotch, and as soon as Maddie took a single step, your body cried out in aching pain, but there was nothing you could do.

Far above you, Maddie’s muffled voice spoke. “You didn’t have to get up so early for this, sis.”

A bubbly voice giggled, indicating it was Sophie. “What? And miss your little basketball thingy? No way! I totally support you, Maddie!”

“Thanks, Soph.” Maddie replied, giving her energetic sister a hug. A third voice spoke up, sing-song voice hiding a hint of playfulness.

“You should see your sister on the court, Sophie.” The third person, Aria, laughed. “She tears it up out there, especially with her…little good luck charm.”

Maddie blushed and looked down at her right foot. Truthfully, she’d almost completely forgotten about you, her mind fully focused on the upcoming competition. She was now acutely aware of your presence under her foot. Sophie, though, was totally unaware. Maddie hadn’t told anyone in her family what she’d done with you, for fear of embarrassment from Sophie, disappointment from Kimberly, and anger from Cassie.

Strolling away from the house, the park where the competition was being held was only a few blocks away. The breeze was chill and the air crisp, beams of sunlight streaking through the thick clouds of early morning. Sophie skipped along happily, Maddie walked methodically, trying not to put much pressure on her right foot, and Aria trailed behind, admiring her best friend’s short shorts clad posterior, and also peering intently at Maddie’s right foot.

Upon reaching the park, Maddie found about twenty other people were there for the competition, and thirty others aside from them were there to watch. Signing up at the registration table, Maddie noted that she was being slotted into the last placement, meaning she’d be the final contestant up onto the court. It put all the pressure on her to win, but it also meant she’d know exactly how much she had to score to take home the trophy.

The competition began, and the first participant walked onto the court. Aria and Sophie took a front row seat, but Maddie was too wired up to sit, and stood the whole time. Of course, this meant you had to suffer beneath her full weight for over two hours as every other competitor in the free throw competition took their turn. The temperature in your sneaker prison steadily rose, and Maddie’s foot began to dump buckets of sweat onto you, while her toes mercilessly tapped against your face.

Finally, it was Maddie’s turn. An intimidating blonde girl had scored 49 points a few rounds back, just one shot shy from a perfect showing. Maddie wiped sweat from her forehead and gulped, knowing she’d need a flawless attempt to reach 50 points and take home the win. Stepping out onto the court, she looked back briefly at Aria and Sophie. Aria blew her a kiss and Sophie waved her arms excitedly and cheered.

Smiling in spite of her stress, Maddie took her first position and grabbed the basketball. Steadying her nerves, she bent at the knee, pushed up off of the concrete, released the ball…and sunk it right into the net. Sophie cried out happily from the front row, and you cried out miserably as Maddie landed after her toss, right foot slamming onto hard pavement and crushing you even flatter than you already were.

Thus began the next ten minutes of your life. Maddie, a vision of beauty and athletic superiority, absolutely blew the competition out of the water, sinking ball after ball into the net with ease. Each throw was perfect, her precision flawless, and her form enviable. Maddie began to laugh, Aria and Sophie were cheering wildly, and even the tough-looking blonde nodded appreciatively as Maddie drew closer and closer to surpassing her score.

The only one suffering was you, and you had hardly endured torment like this in your entire life. Maddie’s foot, drenched in a waterfall of sweat, had formed a swamp of horror inside of her sneaker. Your body was coated in layers of sweat and caked in dirt, not to mention covered in fuzz and partially stained grey from her dirty socks. The sweat was sticking you to her shoe, and the intoxicatingly horrid smell overwhelmed your senses.

With one last hurrah, Maddie nailed the final shot and scored 50 points. She let out a triumphant cry, and everyone in the stands, including the blonde girl, cheered with her. Racing onto the court, Aria and Sophie embraced Maddie, who was laughing and pumping her fist. The competition runner handed her a massive, glimmering trophy, and she posed for a snapshot that would be in the next day’s local paper.

When the excitement of the crowd died down, Maddie led the way back to the Smalls house, clutching her trophy and grinning from ear-to-ear. Riding the high of her triumph, Maddie gushed about how exhilarated she felt, and her vindication at proving she was capable of winning. Sophie basked in her sister’s radiant energy, and Aria relished a tight victory hug. Irina followed the rest of the Smalls family upstairs after Cassie, her prodigious rear shaking back and forth as she meandered up the stairwell. Each tiny movement jiggled her gargantuan derriere, jostling your pancaked body about in a dizzying manner. It felt like an eternity as she scaled the steps to the second floor, and you felt about ready to puke from the constant bouncing and swaying.

All this time you fought and pulled with every ounce of strength you could muster, desperate to pry your body off of her butt. After an hour of crushing and intense pressure, your flattened body stubbornly refused to budge initially, adhered to her shapely ass cheek like a sticker on her miniskirt. Your flattened state was so fine and thin that your mere presence on her booty was barely noticeable even if someone were to run their fingers along the fabric.

Reaching the second floor, Irina poked her head into the spacious bathroom, where Cassie, Sophie, and Maddie were scouring every cabinet and basket, seemingly searching for something. Leaning against the bathroom wall, Irina’s plump butt smashed into the tiled wall, fleshy cheeks squishing together as she did so, and firmly planting your body between her ass and the wall, trapped and unable to move or reform.

Oblivious to how she’d pinned her tiny prisoner, Irina crossed her arms and frowned. “What on earth are all of you searching for?”

Kimberly, who was standing in the middle of the room, sighed. “Cassie’s lost her little fiancé. The one foot tall one, remember? She thinks something might’ve happened to him.”

Irina couldn’t help but chuckle. “Goodness, you all are taking this prank so far!”

Cassie whirled to face her, glaring. Tears dappled her cheeks. “He’s not a prank, Irina! He’s my precious fiancé, and he’s lost!”

Motherly instincts kicking in, Irina stopped laughing and brought Cassie in for a hug. “There, there, sweet girl. I’m sorry, I just can’t quite grasp a handsome young thing being so tiny.” She stroked your fiancée’s head lovingly, while Cassie buried her face into the older woman’s massive tits. She pulled back a minute later, still upset.

“He’s only been here two hours, and now he’s missing!” Cassie said, distraught. “I’m the worst, why would he ever marry me now!”

Irina scoffed. “He’d be a fool to turn you down, darling, Gorgeous, caring, kind, funny, and a brilliant student?” She shook her head. “No, the poor thing must’ve gotten…squished, right? I believe I heard he could be flattened and such. Let’s try looking for him in another room, shall we?”

Sparing a small smile, Cassie nodded and trailed out of the bathroom towards her bedroom, while Irina dutifully followed. Sadly, the other three Smalls women had turned back to scanning the bathroom, their backs to you as Irina sauntered away. As such, not a soul saw your painfully mashed form glued to Irina’s buttocks as she followed after your wife-to-be.

Entering Cassie’s room, Irina dutifully looked into cabinets and drawers for any sign of you, while Cassie checked thoroughly under the bed. As Cassie was preoccupied, you once more went unnoticed, but you didn’t waste this chance. You fought tooth and nail to wiggle and pry yourself free from the curvaceous milf who’d entrapped you, until finally you managed to peel your squished head free.

Disaster struck right then, however, as Irina plopped down onto Cassie’s bed with an exhausted sigh. Her big booty slapped onto the bed, smashing you firmly into place and rendering all your earlier progress moot as you were pounded. Wiggling a bit for comfort, Irina’s miniskirt clad ass ground you to a pulp, smearing your recognizable human features into indecipherable blurs of tan.

“Oh, goodness dear, where has your man run off to?” Irina inquired, wiping beads of sweat from her forehead. Cassie retreated from under the bed, tears springing to her eyes again.

“I-I…don’t know. I don’t know!” She cried. Her panic brought the rest of her family into the room a moment later, and Kimberly and Sophie buried Cassie in a big hug, promising her that they’d keep looking for you. All the while, Irina stayed seated, unaware of how her most eye-catching asset was slowly but surely claiming you, and hiding you from the one who sought you the most, standing just a few feet away.

After a minute, Selena and Persephone entered the room. Persephone ran up to Irina and took hold of her hand, grasping it firmly. Selena stayed near the door, nervously biting her lip.

“Mommy, mommy! Can we go home now? I want a snack!” Persephone asked excitedly, bouncing up and down.

Whispering, Selena looked nervous. “Y-You had work to do…right, mom?”

Irina slapped her forehead. “Oh, of course! I have a few more work orders to fill before tomorrow.” Standing up, Irina brushed herself off, not in the least feeling your presence on the back of her skirt.

Turning to face the Smalls family, Irina presented you to the doorway, effectively keeping you hidden from the four giantesses who could save you easiest. This was compounded by Selena grabbing Persephone’s hand and leading the young girl back downstairs, the two heading away from you and not seeing you on their mother’s butt.

“Sorry to head out.” Irina apologized. “I hope I can meet your delightful little fiancé next time I come over.”

Cassie mumbled a response, and Irina backed out of the room while waving, her infuriatingly simple gesture once more keeping you away from the sight of your beloved Cassie and her family. She didn’t turn around until she was by the stairs, and each of the Smalls women had already looked away. Her house was right across the street, so Persephone raced wildly across the road, Selena scurrying after her to watch for cars and keep the rambunctious girl safe. Irina trailed in the back, smiling at her daughters and their energetic relationship. Her large rear end continued to bounce and sway as she walked, but sadly no one was out and about in the neighborhood to stare at Irina and potentially see you.

However, Irina also had a work room, a spacious room at the end of the hallway filled with fabrics, dyes, paints, sewing machines, chemical solvents, art utensils, two clothes lines, and a few mannequins of varying sizes. Irina often referred to it as her “studio”.

Slipping into her studio, Irina approached a neat stack of papers on a side desk. Her fashion designing services were immensely popular, and she was frequently recruited by the neighbors for work. Her prices were fair and her commitment to quickly fulfilling orders was commendable. Each paper in the stack was an order from a customer, organized by date received. She’d been meaning to do at least three more orders by tomorrow.

Grabbing the first paper, Irina then walked over to her work station to sit down and begin. Meanwhile, you’d spent the last ten minutes prying and twitching against Irina’s huge butt cheek, pleading with any god above to save you. Slowly but surely your squishy skin unstuck from Irina’s sweat-caked miniskirt, and time seemed to go into slow motion as she neared her chair. Drifting free, your body brushed along the black-haired giantess’ leg and fluttered to the ground, lying in a small heap. Far above you, Irina plopped into her seat, cracked her knuckles, and leaned forward over her desk.

At that exact moment, the scatterbrained goddess accidentally knocked over a small jar of paintbrushes, sending the art utensils clattering to the ground. The jar fell down onto your face, while the brushes dropped around your mangled body. Laughing at her own clumsiness, Irina bent over and scooped the brushes back into the cup, but in doing so uncovered your lumpy, battered body, and made eye contact.

Frowning, Irina scrapped you off the floor and lifted you up onto her desk, scrutinizing you under the brighter light. Stroking your skin, she titled her head in confusion.

“What is this…some sort of stretchy fabric?” She said, her warm breath washing over you. Panic filled you in an instant, and you tried to jerk and twitch in her hands, but to no avail. You could see light dancing dangerously in Irina’s eyes, and a moment later the colossal woman parted her luscious lips to speak again.

What does she say?

11514141.content:
“Goodness, this fabric would be perfect for that bikini thong Sophie requested!” Irina beamed, her smile wide and her eyes shining brightly. Your own eyes widened in abject terror, and you fought to quiver and shake violently to alert Irina to your true nature. Sadly, the oblivious woman slammed you down onto the desk a second later, rubbing you flat with her palm while still smiling from ear-to-ear.

“I don’t know where you came from, mystery fabric, but you’re perfect!” Irina happily declared aloud. “I bet it was a sneaky gift from Selena, the shy darling. I’ll have to thank her later.”

While continuing to rub your body flat, further smearing your facial features until you had been reduced to nothing but a featureless blob of tan, Irina used her free hand to pull a large Tupperware bowl closer. She popped off a cap of a nearby bottle, and poured a generous amount of red liquid into the bowl, filling the bowl nearly to the lip.

“Ah, okay, let’s see here…” Irina flicked through the paper sheet outlining Sophie’s request for the bikini thong. The paper was decorated in the margins with happy faces and glitter, much to Irina’s amusement. “…okay, that precious girl just wants a solid red dye for the fabric’s base layer. Easy peasy!”

With an innocent grin masking what she was about to subject a poor innocent man to, Irina grabbed you and tossed you right into the bowl of red liquid. She pushed down on your chest, submerging you completely under the sea of red, and once you were fully dunked in, she sealed the lid back onto the bowl, entrapping you completely in the bowl and fully under the liquidy lake of red.

Turning her attention away from you, Irina used her phone to start up a playlist of carefree pop music, then returned to looking at Sophie’s work order. Sophie also wanted a matching bikini top, so Irina dug around in her fabric drawers and containers before producing a squishy tan fabric frighteningly similar to your body’s own unique properties. She proceeded to fill a second bowl of red dye and dunk you in as well.

For the next hour after that, Irina went to work on her second order, a simple request from a neighbor down the road for two matching pink bows. With uncanny skill and ability, Irina danced along to the music while finding just the right strips of fabric, cutting them to size, adding in glitter, ornately tying them into a pristine position, and then placing them in a box, sealing up the box and writing the recipient’s name on the top. Every so often she’d grab your bowl and the other bowl and shake them a bit, swirling you around.

Finally, Irina removed the top of your bowl and pulled your soggy body out. Still unaware to your true nature, Irina walked over to a sink in the corner of the room and wrung your body dry, squeezing you painfully until every last drop drained from you. You winced at the pain, and renewed your struggle to reform, though a small part of your brain recognized it was barely helping at this point.

While Irina walked back to her desk, you caught a brief glimpse of yourself in the mirror, and you mentally screamed, your mute cries unable to escape your badly flattened lungs. Your body, after soaking in the bowl, had been dyed entirely bright red, every last inch of your bare skin bright red in tone. Not a single spot of tan remained, and to make matters worse, the red dye also insidiously hid your human features from view almost entirely!

Dropping you back onto her desk, Irina perused her work order. “Okay, next comes…little purple flowers. Oh, guess I should reshape you before then! Silly me!”

Mother Briarwood grabbed you up into her soft, warm hands, her gentle and caring demeanor morphing into sheer horror from your perspective. Having done this hundreds of times before, Irina began molding and stretching your body into the perfect desired shape, all while you struggled in vain, desperate to free yourself from this nightmare.

Irina squeezed your chest tighter and flatter, pinching your legs and head and stretching you out into an elongated shape. Gripping what was essentially your arms and legs, she pulled them away from the rest of your body and smashed them together at the ends, kneading your squishy left hand and left foot together, and your right hand and right foot together so badly they stuck like glue.

Grabbing your arms and legs, which now formed two semi-circles connected to your chest and head, she pulled them out at the sides, widening them ever so slightly. She also widened your face and chest area a bit. Your body was being stretched to its limits by this woman, and each passing second you felt your body growing more and more numb, the blissful dream of escape fading away.

When Irina finally paused for a breath, sitting back to admire her work, you caught sight of yourself in her mirror again. Sure enough, Irina had molded you into the perfect shape for a revealing yet not too risqué bikini thong. Your head and chest made up the centerpiece of the thong, while your arms and legs looped together would serve as the leg holes for Sophie, your apparent future owner, to slot her legs into.

Sighing with relief, Irina glanced back at the work order. “Right…right…little purple flowers should be all that’s left!” The motherly giantess clapped her hands together and grabbed a paint brush from her little jar. She also squirted a bit of specialized fabric paint onto a small plate, dabbed her brush into the purple goop, and began getting to work.

It was an immensely odd feeling as Irina drew intricate little purple flowers all over your body, the soft brush practically tickling you, and the cold wet paint sending shivers across your thong-shaped body. You tried your hardest to reform or even move, but your efforts were so pitifully miniscule they all went unnoticed by Irina.

After thirty minutes, Irina had painted flowers all across you, covering up your crotch, hands and feet, mouth, and stomach. However, it was her last flower that most terrified you, as the unaware woman lowered her brush a final time, directly onto your right eye. Mentally crying out in surprise, Irina went on tracing the purple flower’s petals straight over your left eye, coating both eyes in purple paint with a care in the world.

Of course, you’d closed your eyes at the last second to avoid the unspeakable pain of a paint brush jabbing your pupils, but the consequences were just as bad. The paint was layered on right over your eyelids, and as the wet goop settled and began to dry, it hardened, fusing to your eyelids and keeping your eyes squeezed shut. You were truly unable to open them and see again, no matter how hard you tried!

Putting her brush away, Irina gently blew air over your body, cool breeze chilling you. She then used a special key from her pocket, unlocked a small cabinet, and retrieved a unique spray bottle. The bottle contained an expensive fabric paint sealant that Irina only used on special occasions, and providing a gorgeous two-piece bikini set for darling Sophie was one such occasion.

Spritzing the chemical mist over your entire body, Irina made sure not to miss a single spot, dousing you thoroughly. The mist settled onto your body, the particles stinging as they touched your skin, before solidifying into a single thin and imperceptible layer over your entire body. The thin layer of mist coagulated and hardened as it settled, finally drying off and sealing your entire body in a protective shining sheen.

You didn’t fully recognize it at the time, but it was now that your fate had been sealed. The fabric sealant acted as a permanent layer of protection for the purple paint and the red dye, keeping the colors from washing or fading away from laundry cycles or usage wear and tear. This, in essence, ensured that for as long as the layer of sealant remained, your body would stay bright red, and the purple flowers would never chip or fade away.

Worse still, the sealant layer hardening around your body was physically encasing you inside. Obviously, the sealant had never been intended for use on humans, and it wouldn’t have worked on you without the dye and paint already in place. Now, the sealant mist had cooled into an invisible bubble across your whole form, literally trapping you in this thong shape and preventing any reformation or movement at all. On top of that, you couldn’t see or speak either! You were, for all intents and purposes, just a simple, if gorgeous, thong now.

Picking you up after a few minutes, Irina daintily pulled on your arm-and-leg fused loops, testing your stretchiness. Satisfied that the sealant had worked its magic, Irina grinned happily. If she’d messed up, the only fix to the fabric paint sealant was an expensive acidic solvent, and she was currently plum out of any. Another batch of solvent was due to be shipped in a week, just in case she needed it, and assuming Persephone didn’t accidentally spill it like she had the previous batch.

Setting you aside, Irina retrieved the squishy fabric from the second red dye bowl and went to work, molding it into a stylish and revealing bikini top perfectly suited to Sophie’s measurements. You could do nothing but wait on Irina’s desk and wallow in despair as she worked, unable to move, reform, or do anything. After an hour, the beautiful bikini top, your partner, was laid down beside you, and Irina reached for a pink gift box under her desk.

"Oh, Sophie will adore this!" Irina gushed. Opening the box, she gently dropped your thong body and the top into the box, sealed the box up with wrapping paper, and addressed it to Sophie. Pleased with a job well done, she left the room and headed downstairs for dinner, figuring she’d just deliver the bikini set tomorrow morning. She also wanted to thank Selena for the squishy fabric gift. Left all alone in her room, the nightmarish reality of your current fate dawned on you, and you drifted into an unpleasant slumber.

What happens in the morning?

115141411.content:
Waking up at some point in the early morning you realized you found yourself incapable of moving or even opening your eyes. For the briefest of moments you had forgotten the terrifying reality of your current situation, but soon enough the realization hit you. You had lost voluntary functioning of all of your senses, only maintaining the the ability to hear and, sadly, smell in your current situation as the lingering scent of Irina's fabric paint hit you. You figured this must be the closest thing to Hell that anyone could experience, your humanity being wiped away unwittingly by a woman who in all other respects seemed quite lovely. Without the intervention of another giantess you were nothing more than a cute, decorative thong for the foreseeable future.

A few hours must have passed by as you cycled through phases of existential panic and unbelievable boredom before you finally felt your surroundings be lifted high into the air. The slight jostling of your thong-form inside of what you assumed to be some type of box as well as the footsteps of your current carrier were all that you could perceive at the time until you heard a door open and shut. Assuming that this must be Irina delivering you to your future sister-in-law, you only prayed that something would happen to interrupt this nice gesture between neighbors and alert someone to your presence. But from what you could tell it seemed like Sophie had nowhere near the critical thinking skills to make this connection. Soon enough Irina rung a doorbell and waited for a moment before someone came to open it.

"Ah Irina it's good to see you again" the voice of Kimberly traveled through the walls of your box to you, "Is that the bikini that Sophie asked for?"

"Yeah it is! Where's she at I wanted to give it to her myself." Irina responded happily.

"She's upstairs putting on her makeup I believe. That girl really loves her photo shoots. I don't get the whole social media influencer thing to be quite honest, but it seems like she really enjoys it and makes some money on the side so I guess it can't be all bad." Kimberly responded warmly to Irina. It ground your gears slightly to hear how nice and welcoming Kimberly seemed to be towards her neighbor compared to how cold and critical she was of you. But that was a worry for back when you were human-shaped, if that day ever came again.

Kimberly motioned for Irina to come in and closed the door behind her. Once again the stomp of her footsteps indicated you two were on the move as she headed upstairs to surprise Sophie with the gift. Reaching her room, Irina stepped in and knocked on her already open door before saying,

"Hey Sophie, here's the bikini bottom you wanted! I hope you like it, I had a lot of fun making it."

Sophie turned around from her vanity mirror and flashed a brilliant white smile before responding, "Wow thank you so much Irina! I can't believe you just make clothes for us for free! You're a lifesaver!" Nearly running with excitement towards her neighbor, Sophie excitedly took the box from Irina and began opening it. You finally felt some light filter onto your body, despite your eyes being sealed shut you could still sense the influx of some light through your closed eyelids. Sophie took one look at your thong shaped form, there was no indication that you could possibly be a one foot tall person. To anyone you would have looked like just a thong, let alone a ditz like Sophie.

"Oh my god it's literally perfect! I had a request to post some pictures on Instagram with a bikini bottom just like this by the end of the day today, but I kind of lost it. So this is a perfect replacement! Thanks Irina" Sophie's enthusiasm was palpable, and so was your trepidation. At that exact moment you began to lose hope in ever being rescued, as neither of these two women had any shadow of a doubt that this article of clothing was just a thong. However, at that exact moment you heard the angelic voice of your beloved Cassie from the hallway.

"Where is he, Where is he, Where is he" she repeated as she raced past Sophie's room, scanning every single inch of the floor. Both Irina and Sophie took a moment to look at her as she raced by before Sophie spoke up,

"Cassie has seriously been panicking since you stopped by yesterday. Her adorable little fiance has been missing and she stayed up all night searching practically every square inch of the house for him. She even searched each of us! Checking underneath our feet, boobs, and butts both with our clothes from yesterday and without them." Sophie detailed her sister's worry to her neighbor.

Confused, Irina responded, "Is he really that easy to lose? That's absolutely horrible I hope nothing bad happened to the guy! I didn't even get a chance to meet him yet!"

"Yeah Cassie said if you squash him hard enough he could just stick right to you like a little sticker or tattoo or something. She told a story of this time she accidentally sat on him back in college and only found him when she brushed her ass off after sitting down to tie her shoe hours later. She said she noticed his nearly two dimensional body on the ground next to her and practically fainted. It's especially common around girls like us with, well, pretty big butts, she said." Sophie filled in her neighbor with the info Cassie had given her the night before.

The gears began to turn in Irina's head with this influx of information. Sure she wasn't a genius by any standards but she wasn't a complete airhead either. She thought back to yesterday when she sat down on the Smalls' couch and Cassie asked her if she had noticed her fiance when she sat down. A tinge of discomfort began to grow in the back of her mind as the possibility of unknowingly doing something terrible to her neighbor's new tiny fiance. Nervously she spoke up, "Sooooo, I mean when stuff like that happens though he still looks like a little two dimensional person though right? Just squished slightly?"

"Cassie said not necessarily, actually. Depending on the angle he gets squashed at he could get totally folded over onto himself! She said a few times he had been crushed in such a weird way that he just looked like a tan little towel or something after! It's really crazy but she said anything is possible with his bizarre squishiness!" Sophie responded, not sensing the panic in Irina's voice. But this last statement was the nail in the coffin and Irina was now mentally freaking out, connecting the dots between finding the strange squishy fabric in her house and her plopping her big butt down on the couch earlier that day. Her mind was racing as she considered the very real possibility that she had just turned a human being into a thong!

Meanwhile you couldn't believe that Sophie had revealed all of this information to Irina, but you were ecstatic. Thinking about how worried Cassie was for you and the incredible extent she was going to in order to find you warmed your heart further, but for the time being you only prayed that Irina would have the wherewithal to bring up the possibility that you were, in fact, the bikini thong that Sophie was now holding.

Does Irina break the news to Sophie?

info.description:
Author's Note before the intro - I'm pretty sure this concept won't be as popular as the typical "one inch to a few inch tall" giantess stories like my other one for example. But I occasionally enjoy writing from the perspective of a main character a bit more noticeable/substantial than the usual tiny guy who is crushed and forgotten about without even being felt. I still plan on adding to both this story and "A Shrunken College Student" as regularly as I can, so for those of you who may be a fan of one of my stories and not the other, don't fret.

Introduction

Your name is Jake Bigg (24) - In nearly every aspect of your life, you are a completely normal guy. Moderately tan skin, brown clean cut hair, a slender but athletic frame, and what you would consider a handsome face. All components of a typical young, attractive guy other than one thing; you are only one foot tall. Doctors and scientists alike have been stumped for the entirety of your life, trying to figure out how you can manage to exist at this height but without any of the typical health concerns or modified appearance of other humans who have been this size. The strangest part of all, however, is the fact that your miniature frame seems to be significantly more durable than that of the average regular sized human. You weren’t a superhero by any means, but it seemed like some characteristic exclusive to you meant that your body was incredibly malleable. You could bend, flatten, stretch, you name it to ridiculous proportions, all while (eventually) returning to human shape with no permanent injuries. At the risk of sounding morbid, this special quality may be the only reason you have lived to see age 24. Because at a height of exactly 12 inches you are no stranger to dangerous situations with the regular sized people of the world. You’ve been kicked, stepped on, sat on, thrown around, you name it and unfortunately you have experienced it. Nonetheless, you came out alive and through it all managed to meet the love of your life, Cassie Smalls.

Cassie Smalls (24) - Your fiancé. From the moment you two met in college you fell head over heels for this girl. She is beautiful, compassionate, funny, the perfect partner in every way. When you first met her in class you two spent the entire period just talking and having fun without her mentioning your height even once, something you could count on one hand the total number of times this had happened in your life. Physically she is stunning, standing rather tall at 5’10” with long brunette hair and an angelic face. Her body is equally as incredible in your opinion, sporting a toned look on the upper half while maintaining just the right amount of thickness around her hips, legs, and butt. She’s a complete 10 and you can’t wait to spend the rest of your life with her, the only thing possibly standing in your way is winning over her family. The story begins with you two heading to spend a month in her childhood home where her mom and sisters currently live.

Other main characters

Kimberly Smalls (42) - Cassie’s mother and hopefully your soon to be stepmother. Rather skeptical of you as it is your first time meeting her and she was not expecting to meet a 1 foot tall guy. She isn’t cruel but isn’t exactly warm to you either. Physically you can see where Cassie got her looks as she is a complete stunner as well, albeit with even larger but somewhat less toned assets than her daughter. 6’0”

Sophie Smalls (20) - Cassie’s youngest sister. Dyes her hair blonde to stand out from the rest of her family, claims to be something called an instagram influencer for her job. She seems genuinely nice to you but also quite ditzy, bubbly, and even forgetful. 5’8”

Maddie Smalls (22) - Cassie’s middle sister. Short, brown hair often tied up in a ponytail. She seems to be the real athletic type, incredibly competitive at everything and always training for something. She seems nice as well but there’s no telling how she might act if you get in between her and winning. 5’11”

Feel free to write in more characters too! They can be friends, neighbors, whatever!

Rules

The interactive is written in second person perspective so use you, your, etc. when referring to the main character of Jake.That being said, feel free to shift to third person occasionally for the giantesses of the story, for example writing out thoughts that might be running through their heads.

Don’t kill Jake and try to avoid hardcore/graphic violence overall really.

No one word to one sentence bridge chapters, try to aim for somewhere around 1,000 characters or 200 words at least.

Topics I will delete:
Anything explicit with waste/scat is a no-go. Alluding to it or involving it in a chapter is okay just don't go overboard with explicit detail about the toilet stuff (farting in general is cool too, again just don't go too heavy with the nastiness)
Any insertion/heavily explicit sexual material. Keep it softcore if it needs to be sexual not hardcore.
Other men in the story. They can be referenced to but no male characters.
Don’t write Jake to be some type of perv, he can totally be attracted to any of the women in the story just don’t have him start jacking off or anything.
